targetString: Tani waxa ay noqotaa khatar badan hadii shaqaalaha qabana shaqada, ama ka shaqaynaya qaadida ama baadhita muunada, wixii looga shakiyo ama lagu og yahay ee ah bukaanka COVID-19.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Nidaamka shaqada ee guud waxaa kamid ah, sifada, qaabak uu u qufacayo, bronchoscopies, daawaynta daryeelka ilkaha qaar iyo shaybaadhka, ama muunada adag qaadideeda.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Shaqooyinka khatarta badan ee dhimashada ah waxa kamid ah shaqaalaha ka shaqeeya diyaarinta maydhka dadka la og yahay ama looga shakiyo COVID-19 wakhtigan ay dhimanayaan; kuwan ayaa leh khatar aad u badan hadii ay qaliin ku samaynayaan maydka. Xakamaynta farsamo ee dheeraadka ah ee kooxda khatarta ku jirta waxaa kamid ah qolka lagu soo xidho bukaanka la og yahay inuu qabo ama looga shakiyo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan shaqada guud ee markaa loo qabtay.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Cadaadiska gaarka ah ee negetifka ah ee gaarka ah waxaa loo samayn karaa habdhismeedyada daryeelka caafimaadka iyo meelaha lagu aaso dadka.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Muunada waa in lagaga sheeqeeyaa tacadirka Biosafety Heerka 3 aad ah.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) waxay ku talinaysaa i bukaanka lasoo dhigayo in loo saaro meel gaar ah oo lagu sugo taas oo ku xidhan hadii looga shakisan yahay COVID-19. Sidoo kale PPE-ga kale, OSHA waxay ku talinaysaa in neefsiga dadka ka shaqaynaya meel u jirta 6 fuush bukaanka la og yahay, ama looga shakiyo inuu qabo, ama qaaday SARS-CoV-2, iyo dadka u samaynaya daawaynta guud.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: Maraykanka, NIOSH N95-ka ay ansixisay ee waji gashadka filterka leh ee neefsiga ah ama waa n loo isticmaalaa si wanaagsan, neefsiga qoraalka ah ee barnaamijka ilaalada oo ay ku jiraan tijaabinta inuu ku xidhmay, tobobar, iyo shaybaadhka caafimaad.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Noocyada kale ee neefsiga waxa ay bixin karaan ilaalo wayn iyo hormar raaxada shaqaalaha ah. WHO kuma taliso in wajiga oo dhan la duubo, maadaama oo COVID-19 uu yahay xanuun neefsi oo aanu ku gudbin dheecaanka jidhka.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO waxay kaliya ku talisaa in la xidho waji gashadka qaliinka shaqaalaha jooga meesha laga galayo shaybaadhka.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Dadka qaadaya muunada neefsiga, daryeelaya, ama qaadaya bukaanka COVID-19 iyad aoo aanay jirin daawayn guud, WHO waxay ku talisaa in xidhaan waji gashadka qaliinka, golofis, ama wajiga duubtaan, dirays iyo golifis xidhaan.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Hadii la samaynayo daawayn keeni karta caabuq, waji gashadka qaliinka ayaa lagu badlaayaa N95 ama FFP2 waji gashadka ah.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Maadaama oo helitaanka PPE uu yar yahay calaamka, WHO waxay ku talinaysaa in la yareeyo baahida loo qabo PPE taas oo ah in maqal iyo muuqaal dadka lagu daweeyo, wax loo dhaxaysiiyo sida daaqad nadiif ah, taas oo u sahlaysa dhamaan dadka ku lug leh daryeelka tooska ah ee gelitaanka qolka uu ku jiro bukaanka COVID-19, in la isticmaali kaliya PPE daruuriga ah shaqooyinka gaar, in lasii wado isticmaalka isla waji gashadkaas iyada oo aan la iska saarin inta dhawrka bukaan loo adeegayo oo isku xanuun qaba, in lala socdo oo la isku duba rido iibka PPE, iyo in dadka laga wacyi geliyo inay isticmaalaan waji gashadka dadka xanuunsanaya.

sourceString: WHEREAS on March 4, 2020, I proclaimed a State of Emergency to exist in California as a result of the threat of COVID-19;
targetString: HALKA Maarso 4, 2020, waxaan bayaaiyay Xaaada Degdeg ah ee ka jirta California taas oo uu keeney khatarta COVID-19;

sourceString: and WHEREAS in a short period of time, COVID-19 has rapidly spread throughout California, necessitating updated and more stringent guidance from federal, state, and local public health officials;
targetString: iyo HALKA mudo yar oo kooban COVID-19 aad ayuu ugu faafay California, taas oo looga baahan yahay in la cusboonaysiiyo iyo tilmaamo dheeraad ah oo la iskaga ilaaliyo oo laga heley saraakiisha caafimaadka shacabka federalka, gobolka, iyo deegaanka;

sourceString: and WHEREAS for the preservation of public health and safety throughout the entire State of California, I find it necessary for all Californians to heed the State public health directives from the Department of Public Health.
targetString: iyo HALKA ilaalinta amaanka iyo caafimaadka shacabka iyada oo Gobolka California oo dhan ah, waxa aan u arkaa inay daruuri u tahay dhamaan reer California inay u fiirsadaan tilmaamaha caafimaadka shacabka Gobolka ee Waaxda Caafimaadka Shacabka.

sourceString: NOW, THEREFORE, I, GAVIN NEWSOM, Governor of the State of California, in accordance with the authority vested in me by the State Constitution and statutes of the State of California, and in particular, Government Code sections 8567, 8627, and 8665 do hereby issue the following Order to become effective immediately:
targetString: IMINKA, MARKAA, ANIGA, GAVIN NEWSON, Badhasaabka Gobolka California, sida ay dhigayso awooda uu isiiyay Dastuurka Gobolka iyo shuruucda Gobolka California, gaar ahaan, Xeerka Dawlada qaybta 8567, 8627. iyo 8665 waxaan halkan soo saarayaa Amarka soo socda oo sida ugu dhakhsaha badan u dhaqan galaya.

sourceString: IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT:
targetString: WAXAA MARKAA LA ARMAY IN:

sourceString: 1) To preserve the public health and safety, and to ensure the healthcare delivery system is capable of serving all, and prioritizing those at the highest risk and vulnerability, all residents are directed to immediately heed the current State public health directives, which I ordered the Department of Public Health to develop for the current statewide status of COVID-19.
targetString: 1) In la ilaaliyo caafimaadka iyo amaanka bulshada, oo la xiqiijiyo bixinta daryeelka caafimaad ee awooda u leh inuu u shaqeeyo cid walba, oo uu mudnaanta siiyo dadka khatarta badan ku jira ee nugul, dhamaan dadka deegaanka waxaa la amray inay sida dhakhsaha ah ula socdaan tilmaamahan caafimaadka shacabka Gobolka ee wakhtigan, kaas oo aan ku amnay Waaxda Caafimaadka Shacabka inay samayso xaalad gobolka oo dhan oo COVID-19 ah.

sourceString: Those directives are consistent with the March 19, 2020, Memorandum on Identification of Essential Critical Infrastructure Workers During COVID-19 Response, found at: https://covid19.ca.gov/.
targetString: Tilmaamahani waxay ka kooban yihiin Maarso 19, 2020, Isfahankii Aqoonsiga Qaab Dhismeedka Muhiimka ah ee Shaqaalaha Daruuriga ah Inta Lagu Jiro Jawaab Celinta, COVID-19, oo laga heleyo: https://covid19.ca.goc/.

sourceString: ORDER OF THE STATE PUBLIC HEALTH OFFICER
targetString: AMARKA SARKAASHA CAAFIMAADKA SHACABKA CAAFIMAADKA

sourceString: To protect public health, I as State Public Health Officer and Director of the California Department of Public Health order all individuals living in the State of California to stay home or at their place of residence except as needed to maintain continuity of operations of the federal critical infrastructure sectors, as outlined at https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors.
targetString: Si loo ilaaliyo caafimaadka shacabka, Aniga oo ah Sarkaalka Caafimaadka Shacabka Gobolka iyo Haamulaha Waaxda Caafimaadka Shacabka California waxa aan ku amray dhamaan shakhsiyaadka degan Gobolka California inay joogaan guryahooda ama meesha ay degan yihiin marka laga tago inta loogu baahan yahay shaqooyinka daruuriga ah ee waaxaha dawlada federalka h u muhiimka ah, sida lagu sheegey https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors.

sourceString: In addition, and in consultation with the Director of the Governor's Office of Emergency Services, I may designate additional sectors as critical in order to protect the health and well-being of all Californians.
targetString: Sidoo kale, iyada oo lagala tashano Maamulaha Xafiiska Badhasaabka ee Adeegyada Degdeg ah, waxa aan u wakiilan karaa waaxda dawlada ee muhiimka ah si markaa loo ilaaliyo caafimaadka iyo badqabka dhamaan dadka reer California.

sourceString: Pursuant to the authority under the Health and Safety Code 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130(c), 120135, 120145, 120175 and 120150, this order is to go into effect immediately and shall stay in effect until further notice.
targetString: Waxa uu ku salaysan yahay oo uu hoos yimaadaa Xeerka Amaanka iyo Caafimaadka 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130(c) 120135, 120145, 120175 iyo 120150. amarkan waxa uu dhaqan galayaa sida ugu dhakhsaha badan oo waxaa inuu sii jiraa ilaa inta wargelin kale ay soo baxayso.

sourceString: The federal government has identified 16 critical infrastructure sectors whose assets, systems, and networks, whether physical or virtual, are considered so vital to the United States that their incapacitation or destruction would have a debilitating effect on security, economic security, public health or safety, or any combination thereof.
targetString: Shuruucdan federalka ah waxa lagu sheegey waaxda dhismaha muhiimka ah ee 16 kuwas oo ah hantida, nidaamyada, iyo daladaha, hadii ay yihiin foolka-fool ama maqal iyo muuqaal, oo waxa loo arkaa inay muhiim u yihiin Maraykanka hadii aan laga shaqaysiinin ama la khalkhaliyo ay saamayn wayn ku keeneyso amaanka, amniga dhaqaalaha, caafimaadka  shacabka ama amaanka, ama wixii kale ee la isku daray.

sourceString: I order that Californians working in these 16 critical infrastructure sectors may continue their work because of the importance of these sectors to Californians' health and well-being.
targetString: Waxa aan amray shaqaalaha reer California ee markaa ka shaqaynaya 16 waaxood ee habdhismeedmak muhiimka u ah inay sii wadaa shaqadooda muhiimka ah ee waaxaha reer California caafimaadkooda iyo badqabkooda.

sourceString: This Order is being issued to protect the public health of Californians.
targetString: Amarkan waxaa loosoo saaray si loo ilaaliyo caafimaadka shacabka reer California.

sourceString: The California Department of Public Health looks to establish consistency across the state in order to ensure that we mitigate the impact of COVID-19.
targetString: Waaxda Caafimaadka Shacabka California waxa ay doonaysaa inay samayso joogtayn marka gobolka si markaa loo xaqiijiyo in aanu saadaalin karno saamaynta COVID-19.

sourceString: Our goal is simple, we want to bend the curve, and disrupt the spread of the virus.
targetString: Yoolasheenu way fudud yihiin, waxaanu doonaynaa in aanu laabno laabka, oo aanu baajiyo faafitaanka fayruska.

sourceString: The supply chain must continue, and Californians must have access to such necessities as food, prescriptions, and health care.
targetString: Nidaamka iibka alaabtu waa inay socotaa, oo reer California waa inay heli karaan cuntooyinka, dawooyinka, iyo daryeelka caafimaadka ee daruuriga ahaa.

sourceString: When people need to leave their homes or places of residence, whether to obtain or perform the functions above, or to otherwise facilitate authorized necessary activities, they should at all times practice social distancing.
targetString: Marka dadka u baahdaan inay ka baxaan guryaha ama meesha ay degan yihiin, hadii ay tahay inay doontaan ama sameeyaan shaqooyinka sare, ama xarumaha kale ee leh hawlaha la ogolaaday, waa inay mar kasta dadka kale ka fogaadaan.

sourceString: 2) The healthcare delivery system shall prioritize services to serving those who are the sickest and shall prioritize resources, including personal protective equipment, for the providers providing direct care to them.
targetString: 2) Nidaamka daryeelka caafimadka waa inuu mudnaanta siiyaa in loo shaqeeyo dadka aadka u xanuusnaya iyo waa inuu mudnaata kala siiyaa khayraadka, oo ay ku jiraan agabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed, wixii bixiyayaal ah ee raacaya tilmaamaha daryeelkooda.

sourceString: 3) The Office of Emergency Services is directed to take necessary steps to ensure compliance with this Order.
targetString: 3) Xafiiska Adeegyada Xaalada Degdega ah waxaa lagu armayaa inuu qaado talaabooyinka daruuriga ah si markaa loo xaqiijiyo in loo hogaansamo Markankan.

sourceString: 4) This Order shall be enforceable pursuant to California law, including, but not limited to, Government Code section 8665.
targetString: 4) Amarkan waa in la dhaqan geliyaa iyada oo lagu doonayo sharciga California, oo uu ku jiro, laakiin aan ku xadidnayn, Xeerka Dawlada qaybta 8665.

sourceString: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that as soon as hereafter possible, this Order be filed in the Office of the Secretary of State and that widespread publicity and notice be given of this Order.
targetString: WAXAA SIDOO KALE LA AMRAY in sida ugu dhakhsaha badan ee macquulka ah, Amarkan in loo geeyo Xafiiska Arrimaha Dibada oo si balaadhan loo baahiyaa oo wargelin laga bixiyaa Amarkan.

sourceString: This Order is not intended to, and does not, create any rights or benefits, substantive or procedural, enforceable at law or in equity, against the State of California, its agencies, departments, entities, officers, employees, or any other person.
targetString: Amarkan looguma talo gelin, oo mana aha, inuu abuuro xuquuq ama gunooyin, jirta ama inaysa, in lagu dhaqan geliyo sharci ama sinaan, oo kasoo horjeeda Gobolka California, hay'adeeha, waaxaha, saraakiishiisa, shaqaalihiisa, iyo shakhsiyaad kale.

sourceString: IN WITNESS WHEREOF I have hereunto set my hand and caused the Great Seal of the State of California to be affixed this 19th day of March 2020.
targetString: WAXAAN HALKAN KU MARAG KACAYAA IN AAN halkan ku diyaariyay wixii aan qaban karo ee keenaya in Siwayn Looga Xidho Gobolka California taas oo ka bilaabanta 19ka Maarso 2020.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: KA TIMID: Ketherina Maher, CEO-ga Hay'ada Wikimedia

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: KU SOCOTA: Dhamaan shaqaalaha Hay'ada Wikimedia

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: KHADKA MAWDUUCA: [Covid-19] Bayaaminta culayska iyo u diyaar garawga mustaqbalka

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: TAARIIKHDA/SAACADA LA DIRAY: 14 Maarso, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: LIISANKA: CC0: Wax lambar ah lama sheegin

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Waxa aanu isku aragnay xaalad adag bishan.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Safmarka COVID-19 waxaa weeye shay cadeeyay isdhax galka bilaa aadanka caalamka iyo masuuliyada midba midka kale ka saaran.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Awood uma lihin joojinta faafitaanka xanuunkan, laakiin waanu garanaynaa qaabka la isku halayn karo ee lagaga jawaabayo garawsha , qada shaqaynta iyo bulshada caalamka dhisideeda taas oo markaa hawlbawle u ah hay'adan.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Tani waxay muujinaysaa dadaalka iyo danaynta aanu ku aragnay dhamaan shaqaalaheena ee iimeelka, wada hadalka iyo wada sheekeysiga taas oo si wayn u xaqiijinaysa cajiibnimada bilaa aadanka aanu nasiibka u helnay in aanu la shaqayno.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Waxa aan kaga faanayo ma jiro dhamaan inaan wada shaqayno.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, qof ayaa soo dhigay mahadnaq shaqadeena ah.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Waxa ay i xasuusiyeen sida ay caalamka wax ku ool ugu tahay in wakhti xaadirkan ay galaan Wikipedia, iyo calaamada awooda badan ee ay u tahay isha macluumaadka muhiimka ah inay online ku jirto oo markaa ay heli karaan dhamaan.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Shaqadaada ayaa macquul ka dhigaysa, hadii websaytku uu sii jiro ama hadii shaqaalaheena lasiiyo mushahar ama amaanka bulshooyinka.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Caalamku waxa uu u baahan yahay macluumaadka Wikipedia uu bixiyo, iminka wakhti kasta si kasii badan.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan oo kaliya aan ahayn waxa aanu qabanayno, laakiin sida aanu u qabanayno, ayaa saamayn wayn ku leh caalamka.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Maadaama oo uu muhiim tahay shaqadani iyo kaalintaada, waxa aanu samayn doonaa hagaajin muhiim ah oo sida aanu u wada shaqayno ah, laga bilaabo todobaadkan.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: In aanu habayno shaqooyinkeena iyo jadwalkeena.

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Sida uu hore u sheegey Robyn, kooxda-c ayaa kulmay habeen hore si ay uga wada hadlaan qaabka iyo jadwalka maalmaha iyo bilaha soo socda.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Wada sheekeysigaa, waxa aanu ku eegnay wixii aanu u aragno inay tahay jawaabta munaasabka ah ee waxa aanu wajahayno iyo qaabka ugu wanaagsan ee hay'ada loo sii wadi karo wakhtigan.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Waxa aanu si balaadhan doonaynaa in meesha aanu uga saarno warwarka oo aanu taageerno shaqadeena mudada dheer.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Hadii aad u baahato isku soo celin, waa caadi.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Dhamaan shaqaalaheena, qansaraaslayaasheena, iyo shaqaalaha heshiiska lagula jiro:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: waxa aanu maalintii shaqayn doonaa 4 saacadood, ama 20 saacadood todobaadkii ilaa inta wargelin kale ay soo baxayso.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Ma bayaaminayno fasax - hadii aad shaqayn karto saacadaha caadiga ah, oo shaqada laguu adeegsan karo.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Laakiin, caalamka lama saadaalin karo wakhti xaadirkan, oo hadii aad u baahan tahay inaad daryeesho qof qoyska ah, inaad soo iibsato cunto, ama aad qabato dhakhtarka, badqabkaaga ayaa mudnaantaada ah.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Lama soconayno wakhtigaaga.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Hadii aad xanuunsanayso, ha shaqaynin.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Anaka oo carabaabayna, laakiin odhanayna.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Looma baahna maalmod fasax xanuun ama PTO in la dalbado - kaliya u sheeg maamulahaaga oo kooxdaada ka caawi inay jadwalkooda habaystaan oo ay markaa u sameeyaan wakhti ay shaqooyinka muhiimka ah loo qabto.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Hadii lagaa talo COVID-19, fadlan u sheeg Bryan ee T&C Ops loo yaqaan T&C ayaa kaa caawin kara taageerada oo markaa xaqiijinaya in xaaladaada sida haboon laguu fiirsado si loo maamulo).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Mushaharka saacadaha si buuxda ayaa loo bixin doonaa.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Waxa aanu hore u nidhi, oo nagala go'an in aanu u hogaansano cida aan heshiiska kula jirto iyo saacadaha shaqaalaheena.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Qof kasta waxa lagu siin doonaa mushaharka saacadiihii caadiga ahaa ee uu shaqayn jiray ee xaaladaha caadiga ah.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Taas waxa kamid ah hadii aad xanuunsato oo aanad shaqayn karin.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Hadii aad doonayso inaad shaqayso, waanu ku caawin doonaa.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Dad badan ayaa u adeegsada shaqada qaab ay isku buuqa iskaga yareeyan ee caalamka ku xeeran.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Waxa bixinayaa abaal marin cajiib ah, gaar ahaan wakhtiga noocan oo kale ah.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Mar kale ayaan ku celinayaa, tani waa daryeelka naftaada.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Kaliya waxa aanu dalbaynaa waa inaad la xidhiidho maamulahaaga, si markaa aanu u ogaan kartno waxa aanu filan karno oo markaa u habayn karno shaqada.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Shaqooyinka qaar ayaa loo arkaa inay daruuri yihiin.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Waxaa jira waxyaabo ay tahay inaynu sii wado qabashadooda.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, Kalsoonida & Amaanka, iyo Dhaqaale uruurinta kooxda (iyo waxyeebo kale) ayaa ah shaqooyinka daruuriga ah ee markaa u baahan taageerada dheeraadka ah.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Waxa aanu bilaabi doonaa nidaamka dhamaan waaxaha si markaa aanu u heli karno ujeedooyinka wakhtigan oo markaa diirada u saari karno taageerada shaqooyinkeena daruuriga ah.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Waxaa jira wax badan oo nooloo qaban karo, waxa aanu kaliya diirada saari doonaa mashaariicda daruuriga ah.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: In iminka la yareeyaa waxyaalo hadhaw ah keeni mayso.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Ma qorshaynayno in "laba jeer la galo shaqada" marka uu xanuunka laga gudbo.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Lagaagama fadhiyo in aan shaqayso wakhti dheeraad ah si aad wakhtiga shaqada ku eeg tahay aad ugu dhamayn karto taas oo aan wakhtigan macquul ahayn.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Waxa aanu aqbalnay in xaaladu ay isbadalshay, oo waxa aanu samayn doonaa bartilmaaeed csuub iyo wakhti munaasab ku ah.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Maxaa ku dhacay APP (Qorshaynta Sanadkii)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Si loo habeeyo waaqiciga cusub iyo shaqada maalintii ee saacadaha la filanayo, waxa aanu qorshaynaynaa in la habeeyo wakhtiga lagu bixinayo Qorshaha Sanadkii ee 2020-2021.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Waxa aanu doonaynaa in aanu soo jeedino kordhin qorshaha 2019-2020 si markaa wakhti loo siin karo miisaaniyada si shaqaalaha loogu ogolaado inay mudnaanta siiyaan shaqooyinka daruuriga ah, daryeelka nafta, iyo daryeelka qoyska inta lagu jiro qaabilaada dadka u baahan ama doonaya inay shaqeeyaan wakhti kayar intii hore dhawrka todobaad ee soo socda.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Waxa uu kordhinta wakhtigani aad u yaraynayaa culayska shaqada ee qorshaha wakhtigan iyo cadaadiska hay'ada oo dhan.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Waxa aanu bari doonaa qorshaheena Gudida todobaadka soo socda oo waxa aanu cusboonaysiin doonaa wakaalada iyo kooxaha talaabooyinka xiga sida ugu dhakhsaha badan ee aannu u xaqiijino.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Waad ku mahadsan tahay kooxda APP ee hogaanka arrintan.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Xaalada xafiiska, soo gaadhida iyo nadiifinta.

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, waxa aanu ogaanay in mid kamid ah shaqaalaha SF ka shaqeeyaa ay dhici karta inuu asiibay fayruska COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Laakiin, iyada oo laga xatadirayo, waxa aanu shaqaalaysiinay koox jeermiska ka disha xafiiska San Francisco o dhan.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Ka faa'idaysiga dawada jeermiska disha ee loogu talo geley isbitaalakada si jeermiska looga dilo meelaha la taataabto, iyo sidoo kale qaybta soo dhawaynta iyo wiisha lagu tago dabaqyada.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Dhismaha waxa uu leeyahay nidaam daryeelka ah oo markaa looga faa'idaysan karo taageerada amaanka ee dadka kiraystayaasha ah.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Waxa aanu ku kalsoonahay in xafiisku uu diyaar inoo noqon doono marka aanu doono in aanu kusoo noqono.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Xafiiskeena DC waxa uu ku yaalaa WeWork, kaas oo nala wadaagay nidaamkiisa COVID-19 naaka iyo dhamaan shaqaalaha DC ka shaqeeya.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, xafiiskeena DC waxaa loo wareejiyay in gebi ahaanba guriga laga soo shaqeeyo taas oo waafaqsan tilmamaamaha ay la wadaageen San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Sida ay yaqaanaan qaar kamid ah shaqaalaheena NYC, waxa aanu sidoo kale ka wada hadlanay sidii loo kiraystan lahaa meel Brooklyn ah.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Wada hadalkaasi uu socda laakiin dib ayuu u dhacay.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Qaar kamid ah shaqaalaheena ayaa meel kale kasoo shaqaynaya markii ugu horeysay.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Shaqaalaheena mudada dheer guriga ku dhax shaqaynaya ayaa garanaya in aan taas habeyn karno, oo waxa aanu doonaynaa in talin qaar kaa siino:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Waxa aad wakhtiga kulanka kusoo koobtaan hal ama ugu badnaan labba saacadood.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Hadii loo baahan yahay madal ka dheer, waxa aad isla eegtaan inaad u jaajbisaan mudo dhawr ayaamood ah.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Kulanka sida cad loo cadeeyay, waa inaad yeelataa ajande, oo soo dir warbixin lasii akhriyo arka hore.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Waxa aad samaysaa fiidyaw toos ah, oo waxa aad isticmaashaa agabka sida Google Docs iyo Zoom si markaa loo fududeeyo oo loo xidhiidhitaa.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Waxa aad hogaamisaa fududaynta kulan kasta, qof ayaa la soconaya wada sheekeysi wixii su'aalo ah oo markaa la socona liiska dadka hadlaya, oo qof ahaa ka caawin doona qaadida qoraalada (ama inuu isku daro qoraalada la qaaday).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Waxa aad soo dirtaa iimeel waaxda taageerada farsamo hadii aad u baahan tahay sameedo haboon.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Waxa aad isticamashaa nususaacahaaga wanaagsan.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Waxa aad ka qayb gashaa #remoties idaacadaha aha ee Slack ee wada hadalka dadka la wada shaqeeyo ee ku saabsan qaybinta shaqada

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Kooxda Shaqada Waaxda Shaqaalaha ayaa eegaya tilmaamo webinar ah oo markaa lagu kordhinayo taageerada qaybinta shaqada ee Aas Aasiga ah.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay waxa aanu ka dalbanay bulshada inay helaan joojinta munaasabadaha deeqda lacagta Wikimedia, sida tafatirka, ilaa inta ay WHO ku dhawaaqayso in safmarku uu dhamaaday.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Waxa aanu u sheegnay in aanu fahanay in dalabkeenii la joojiyay iyo xadidaadaha kale ee markaa lagu soo rogi karo ei markaa loo buuxiyo deeqa ay ogolaaday hawlaha ah iyo in aan cidna ayna ku mudan ciqaab dib u dhiga ama wax ka badalka yoolashan.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Todobaadka soo socda waxa aanu raaci doonaa tilmaamo dheeraad ah oo Wikimenia ah iyo deegaamada kale iyo shirarka bulshada ee heerkulka ah.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Qaabka guud ee bulshooyinka caalamka waxa aad moodaa inay murugo  leedahay khalkhalka laakiin waxa aanu aaminsanahay bayaaminta iyo awooda diirada lagu saarayo bulshadooda, Wikimedia iyo sida kale.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Marka lagasii socdo, CRT waxay ka shaqaynaysaa inay samayso bog Meta-Wiki ah si loo bixiyo meelo bulshada ah oo lagula soconayo saamaynta iyo la socodka xidhiidhka aanu la leenahay.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: La socodka wixii arrimo ah ee la xidhiidha COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Waxa aanu soo diri doonaa casuumad Khamiiska soo socota, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT kulan shaqaalaha oo gaar ah.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Waxa aanu uga faa'idaysan doonaa wakhtigaas in aanu bixino macluumaadka dheeraadka ah, ka jawaabto su'aalo oo aan wakhti dheeraad ah gelino in dadka kale aanu isku xidhano.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Waynu ku wada jirnaa oo waxaynu gacan uga gaysan doonaa si kasta.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, waxa kuusii soconaya in macluumaadku uu kaasoo gaadho iimeelkan, iyo wixii kale ee daruurigaah ee macluumaadka la xidhiidha COVID-19, ee Xafiiska Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT ayaa ka shaqayn doona gelinta bogagan iyo dhamaan macluumaadka oo hal meel ah.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Waxa aanu sidoo kale ka shaqaynaynaa in aanu xidhiidhka joogtayno shaqaalaha degan dalalka wakhti xaadirkan uu saamayn wayn uu ku yeeshay.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Hadii aad qabto wax su'aalo ah, oo ku saabsan socdaal, munaasabado, baahinta tooska ah ee shaqada ee waawayn, ama cabaqado internetka ah, ama wax kale oo aad u baahan tahay, fadlan haka gaban inaad wargeliso oo aad la shaqayso CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Waxa aanu halkan u joognaa in aanu ku caawino oo aan kuula shaqayno sida loogu baahdo.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Hadii aad hayso arrin sir ah ama xasaasi ah, fadlan iimeel ugu dir Bryan Judan - Maamulaha Shaqala Caalmaka ee Waaxda Shaqaalaha.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Waxba kamid ah isbadalan waa in aan loo arag culays shaqadeena ah iyo waajibaadkeena.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Laakiin, waxaa weeye aqoonsiga wakhtigan, oo shaqooyinka iyo waajibaadka waxa ay u badan tahay inay la qabsan doonaan sidii horena ay ula qabsadeen.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Waxaa jira talaabooyin aanu u aragno inay daruuri u yihiin taageerada dhaxdeena si markaa aaun usii wadno shaqada, oo uu dhaqaaqeenu u bixiyo taageero ee ay u baahan yhiin, iyo caalamka adeega ay ku tiirsan yihiin.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Shaqadeena qorshaysan waxa ay halkaa ugu sugnaan doontaa marka wakhtigeedu yimaado.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, waxa la gaadhay wakhtigii uu midba midkeena kale taageeri lahaa oo aynu samaynsan lahayn makaanka shaqooyinka muhiimka ah ee todobaadyada iyo bilaha soo socda.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Waxa aanu u baahanahay dhamaantiin inay taasi dhacdo, oo waxa aanu doonaynaa dhamaantiin in aad naftiina daryeeshaan iyo qoysaskiisa si markaa aanu wax kuugu tari karno marka baahidu timaado.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Iminka, fadlan -- maydh gacmahaaga oo ha taaban wajigaaga!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, iyo Tony S), iyo inta kale ee Kooxda Hogaanka  (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, iyo Toby N).

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 virus is the cause of COVID-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), a contagious respiratory disease that was first identified in December 2019, in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: Fayruska SARS-CoV-2 oo uu keeno COVID-19 (xanuunka coronavirus 2019), taas oo ah xanuun faafaa oo neefsiga ah kaas oo markii ugu horeysay lagu ogaaday Diseember 2019, Wigan, Hubei, Jayna.

sourceString: The disease is a type of coronavirus, the same family that includes SARS, MERS, and some varieties of the common cold.
targetString: Xanuunku waxa uu kamid tahay noocyada coronavirus, waxaanu kamid yahay qoyska SARS, MERS, iyo xanuuno kale oo hargabka ah.

sourceString: It was declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization (WHO) on 11 March 2020.
targetString: Waxa ay Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) ku dhawaaqsay inuu safmar yahay 11 Maarso 2020.

sourceString: While much about COVID-19 is still unknown, preliminary data suggests that it is more virulent and contagious than the seasonal flu, and less virulent but more contagious than SARS and MERS.
targetString: In kasta oo weli wax badan aan laga aqoon COVID-19, macluumaadka ugu horeeya ee laga heleyaa waxa uu muujinayaa inuu yahay xanuun fayrus oo faafa oo aan ahayn hargab xiliyeedkii, oo jaba fayrus yar laakiin ka faafid badan SARS iyo MERS.

sourceString: Older people and those with underlying conditions are the most at risk of serious complications including death.
targetString: Dadka waawayn iyo kuwa qaba xanuuno kale ayaa khatarta ugu badan ku jira xanuunkan oo ilaa ku dhinta.

sourceString: Due to the spread of the disease, you are advised not to travel unless necessary, to avoid being infected, quarantined, or stranded by changing restrictions and cancelled flights.
targetString: Maadaama oo uu faafayo xanuunku, waxaa lagugula talinayaa in aanad socdaalin, inaad iska ilaaliso in caabuqa lagu gaadhsiiyo, in lagu karantimeeyay, ama inaad isla ilaalisa adiga oo xadidadaya ama joojinaya filaadyada.

sourceString: Avoid crowded places whenever possible.
targetString: Waxa aad iska ilaalisaa meesha ay dadka badan iskugu yimaadaan marka ay macquulka tahay.

sourceString: This is not just to protect you, but also those you come in contact with.
targetString: Tani kaliya looma samaynayo amaankaaga, laakiin sidoo kale dadka aad isku dhawaanaysaan.

sourceString: As it happens, you probably aren't missing much by staying home, as many attractions around the world are closing their doors to avoid spreading the disease.
targetString: Marka taasi dhacdo, waxa dhici karta in ayna wax badan ku dhaafin marka aad guriga joogto, maadaama oo wax badan oo caalamka ah la xidhay si markaa loo baahiyo faafitaanka xanuunka.

sourceString: If you do need to travel, take precautions as you would for other infections: wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and avoid contact with sick people.
targetString: Hadii ay khasab tahay inaad socdaasho, taxadir maadaama oo aad qaadsiin karto dadka kale: maydh gacmahaaga badanaa, waxa aad iska ilaalisaa taabashada wajigaaga, waxa aad ku qufadaa suxulkaaga ama kilinikis, waxa aad iska ilaalisaa inaad isasoo gaadhaan dadka xanuunsanaya.

sourceString: Before traveling, read up on the extensive and fast-changing array of travel restrictions that have been imposed around the world.
targetString: Kahor inta aanad socdaalin, waxa aad akhridaa macluumaadka badan ee aadka isku badala ee xadidaada socdaalka ee markaa caalamka oo dhan lagu soo rogay.

sourceString: After travel, monitor your health and consider self-isolation for two weeks to avoid transmitting the disease to others.
targetString: Kadib marka aad socdaasho, waxa aad la socotaa caafimaadkaaga oo waxa aad isku daydaa inaad meel isku soo xidho mudo laba todobaad ah si aad iskaga ilaaliso inaad dadka kale u gudbiso xanuunka.

sourceString: Transportation from long-distance passenger flights to local buses has been curtailed or completely shut down in many countries due to low demand or government orders.
targetString: Gadiidka rakaabka ee diyuuradaha meesha dheer qabanaya ilaa basaska deegaanka waa la xidhay dalal badan maadaama oo ay yaraatay cidii raaci lahayd ama dawladu amar kusoo rogtay.

sourceString: Many international and regional borders are closed.
targetString: Xuduudo badan oo deegaamada iyo dalalka waa la xidhay.

sourceString: If you are away from home, and especially if you are in another country, consider returning home as soon as possible; this may get even more difficult as restrictions continue to change.
targetString: Hadii aanad guriga joogin, gaar ahaan hadii aad dal kale joogto, waxa aad isku daydaa inaad hore usoo noqoto; taasi waxaa dhici karta inay aad u adkaato maadaama oo xadidaaduhu ay isasii badalayaan.

sourceString: In some cases it may simply not be possible, even if you're healthy and meet the legal requirements for entry.
targetString: Mararka qaar macquul maaha, xataa hadii aad caafimaad qabto oo aad buuxisay shuruudihii aad sida sharciga ah ugu soo geli lahayd.

sourceString: If you can't find a way back to your country, contact your nearest embassy or consulate for assistance.
targetString: Hadii aanay jirin qaab aad dalka ugu soo noqon kartaa, waxa aad la xidhiidhaa safaarada kuugu dhaw ama qunsuliyada si ay kaaga caawiyaan.

sourceString: They may be able to organize an evacuation, identify non-regularly scheduled flights, or give you an emergency loan to pay for transport.
targetString: Waxa ay kuu samayn karaan in ilaa dalkaaga lagu soo qixiyo, inay ogaadaan duuliyaad aan qorshaysnayn, ama inay kusiiyaan dayn xaalada degdeg ah si aad iskaga bixiso socdaalkaaga.

sourceString: In case they can't, make preparations in case you need to stay where you are for an extended period.
targetString: Hadii ayna kuu suurto gal ahayn, waxa aad u diyaar garawdaa hadii ay khasab kugu noqoto inaad joogto meesha aad joogto mudo dheer.

sourceString: If you do find a way back home, be prepared that it may be expensive, inconvenient, and have unusual restrictions (such as no checked baggage).
targetString: Hadii ay jirto qaab aad kusoo noqon kartaa, waxa aad u diyaar noqotaa inay noqon karto qaali, mid aan munaasab ahayn, oo caadiyan ay xadidan tahay (sida in aan alaabta qaybta kaargooga aan laguu saarin).

sourceString: As of early April 2020, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 is approaching one million.
targetString: Laga bilaabo horaanta Abriil 2020, tirada dadka la xaqiijiyay inay qabaan COVID-19 waxay ku dhawayd hal milyan.

sourceString: Though the disease started in mainland China, it has spread around the world and China has fewer confirmed cases and deaths than several other countries.
targetString: In kasta oo uu xanuunku kasoo bilaabay Jayna, waxa uu ku faafay caalamka oo dhan oo Jayna waxay leedahay tiro kayar dadka qaadaya ama ku dhimaya marka loo eego dhawr dal.

sourceString: Europe is the new epicenter of the pandemic.
targetString: Yurub ayaa ah meesha hoyga u noqotay sarmarka cusub.

sourceString: All but a handful of countries have reported at least one case, with the highest numbers of reported cases in the United States, Spain, Italy, Germany, France, mainland China, Iran, and the United Kingdom.
targetString: Dhamaan marka laga tago dhawr dal ayaa bayaamiyay inay ka heleen ugu yaraan hal qof, kuwaas oo tirada ugu badan ay sheegteen Maraykanka, Isbayn, Talyaaniga, Jermalka, Faransiiska, Jayna, Iiraan, iyo Ingiriiska.

sourceString: Local transmission is established in many countries in all major inhabited regions of the world except some Pacific island nations.
targetString: Waxa uu ku gaagay deegaamada dalka ee ka jira dalal badan oo ah deegaanada dadka ugu badan ku nool yihiin oo caalamka oo dhan ah marka laga tago qoomiyadaha jasiiyada Baasifiga.

sourceString: (See updates from the WHO.)
targetString: (Eeeg macluumaadka ugu danbaysa ee ay soo saartay WHO).

sourceString: The full extent of the spread is uncertain, due in part to limited testing.
targetString: Weli si wanaagsan looma garanayo ilaa inta uu le'eg yahay faafitaanku maadaama oo ay xadidan tahay shaybaadhadu.

sourceString: Many countries are experiencing a severe shortage of test kits, and the authorities have not been able to test everybody who is at high risk, so the real number of cases is probably much higher than the official one.
targetString: Dalal badan ayaa la filanayaa inay la kulanto yaraan bushqadaha shaybaadhka oo aad u daran, oo maamulada umay suurto gelin inay baadhaan qof kasta oo khatar badan ugu jira, markaa tirada dhabta ah ee dadka qabaa waxay u badan tahay inay aad uga badan tahay ta rasmiga ah ee la sheegey.

sourceString: Countries also differ in their testing and reporting practices, so comparisons of the number of reported cases do not tell the full story of how the epidemic has progressed in different areas.
targetString: Dalalku sidoo kale way ku kala duwan yihiin shaybaadhka iyo nidaamka ay u sheegaayan, markaa marka la is barbar dhigo tirada la sheegey ma sheegeyso taariikhda rasmiga ah ee safmarka ee inta uu ka le'eg yahay aagaga.

sourceString: The virus is transmitted through respiratory droplets and through objects.
targetString: Fayrusku waxa uu ku faafaa dhibcaha candhuufta kasoo duula iyo shayada.

sourceString: The coronavirus is a relatively large virus, meaning it is not truly airborne: it will settle down in respiratory droplets.
targetString: Coronavirus waa fayrus balaadhan, taas oo ka dhigan in aanu hawada wada raacin: waxa uu deji karaa dhibcaha candhuufta ee soo duulaysa.

sourceString: Staying two metres (six feet) away from other people is usually enough to prevent transmission through this route.
targetString: In la isku jirsado laba mitir (lux fuudh) ayaa caadiyan ku filan in laga hortago faafitaanka dhabadan.

sourceString: Transmission from objects can happen, for example, if someone sneezes, touches a doorknob, and then other people touch the doorknob and then touch their faces.
targetString: Isku gudbinta shayada laga qaado ayaa dhici karta, tusaale ahaan, hadii uu qof qufaco, taabto gacanta albaaba, iyo kadibna ay taabtaan dad kale gacantii oo ay kadibna taabtaan wajigooda.

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 virus may last on cardboard for up to 24 hours and on plastic for up to 3 days.
targetString: Fayruska SARS-CoV-2 waxa uu kaadhka ku dul noolaan karaa ilaa 24 saacadood halka uu caaga ku dul noolaan karo 3 maalmood.

sourceString: Transmission via the fecal–oral route may also be possible.
targetString: Isku gudbintan afka ayaa sidoo kale macquul ah.

sourceString: Evidence suggests that COVID-19 is contagious even without symptoms, though to what extent is still being investigated.
targetString: Cadaymo ayaa muujinaya in COVID-19 uu yahay xanuun faafa iyada oo aanu qofku yeelan calaamado, in kast aoo aan laakiin weli la garaynin ilaa inta oo la baadhayo.

sourceString: Common symptoms include a fever, dry cough, and fatigue.
targetString: Calaamadaha caamka ah waxaa kamid ah xumad, qufac qalalan, iyo daal.

sourceString: Other less common symptoms include shortness of breath, a sore throat, headache, muscle pain, or sputum production.
targetString: Calaamado kale oo aan sidaa caam u ahayn waxaa kamid ah neefsiga oo adkaada, cunaha oo xidhma, madax xanuun, murqo xanuun, ama xab.

sourceString: Some patients have very mild symptoms, similar to a cold.
targetString: Bukaanka qaar ayaa yeesha calaamado yar, oo sida hargabka oo kale ah.

sourceString: Serious complications include pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and multi-organ failure leading to disability or death.
targetString: Xanuunada aadka u daran waxaa kamid ah sanbab xanuun, neefsiga oo aad u daran, iyo in unugyo badan ay shaqada joojiyaan ama dhimasho.

sourceString: About 80% of infections result in mild symptoms, while the remaining may result in hospitalization.
targetString: Ilaa 80% caabuqa ayaa ku danbeeya calaamado yar, halka inta kale ee soo hadhay uu ku danbeeyo in isbitaalka la is dhigo.

sourceString: Case fatality rate is estimated at 1-3% of infected individuals, most of whom are elderly with underlying health conditions.
targetString: Xadiga uu dilo waxaa lagu qiyaasaa 1-3% dadka uu ku dhaco, kuwaas oo badankood ay yihiin dad waawayn oo qaba xanuuno kale.

sourceString: The fatality rate is much higher for those over 70 but significantly lower for those under 40.
targetString: Xadiga dhigamshadu waxay aad ugu badan tahay dadka ka wayn 70 jirka laakiin waxay aad ugu yar tahay dadka ka yar 40 jirka.

sourceString: Those most at risk of COVID-19 infection and serious complications are the elderly and those with weakened immune systems or underlying health conditions like cardiovascular disease, diabetes, hypertension, chronic respiratory disease, and cancer.
targetString: Dadka khatarta ugu badan ugu jira inay qaadaan caabuqa COVID-19 iyo mushkilad caafimaad oo aad u daran waxaa weeye dadka waawayn ee uu diciifay difaaca jidhkooda ama qaba xanuun kale sida wadne xanuun, macaan, dhiikar, xanuunada neefsiga oo mudo dheer ah, iyo kaansar.

sourceString: Not many cases are reported in children and most of these are mild or moderate, though a significant fraction do get pneumonia.
targetString: Wax badan laguma sheego caruurta oo inta lagu sheegaana waa wax yar ama dhexe, in kasta oo wax badan oo kamid ah ay qabaan sanbab xanuun.

sourceString: Occupationally, health care workers have higher risk compared to others with clusters of disease among workers and in health care settings.
targetString: Mararka qaar, shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka ayaa khatar badan ugu jira marka la barbar dhigo xanuunada kale ee shaqaalaha iyo habdhismeedka caafimaadka.

sourceString: The time between being exposed to the virus and the emergence of symptoms (incubation period) is typically between 2 and 14 days, though there has been one reported case in China where symptoms appeared 27 days after exposure.
targetString: Wakhtiga u dhaxeeya inta uu qofka uu ku dhacay xanuunka iyo inta ay soo baxayaan calaamadu (mudada uu qarsoon yahay) ayaa caadiyan u dhaxeeya 2 ilaa 14 maalmood, in kasta oo la sheegey Jayna in xanuunku uu kusoo baxay calaamadihiisu 27 maalmood kamid marka uu qofku qaaday.

sourceString: As of February 2020, the period of infectiousness is unknown, but is likely most significant when people are symptomatic.
targetString: Laga bilaabo Febraayo 2020, mudada caabuqa lama garanayo, laakiin waxay u badan yahay inay aad u badan tahay marka loo eego xanuunada kale.

sourceString: There is evidence of transmission from people who don't have symptoms, although to what extent is still being investigated.
targetString: Tani waxa ay muujinaysaa isku gudbinta dadka aan qabin xanuunada, in kasta oo ilaa inta uu le'eg weli la baadhayo.

sourceString: It is unclear whether it is possible to be reinfected with the virus after recovering from it the first time around.
targetString: Ma cada hadii ay macquul tahay in dib loo qaado fayruska kadib marka laga ladnaado markii kowaad ee la qaaday.

sourceString: Long-term effects for people who have recovered remain unclear, but there is evidence of reduced lung capacity in some recovered patients.
targetString: Saamaynta mudada dheer ee dadka ka ladnaaday weli ma cada, laakiin waxa muuqata in ay jiraan calaamado inay yaraadeen awoodii sanbabka ee bukaanka ka ladnaaday qaar.

sourceString: Testing for the virus usually consists of a swab inserted through the nose or a throat swab which is analysed in a laboratory for the virus.
targetString: Shaybaadhka fayruska gaar ahaan ku jira duufka sanka laga qaado ama candhuufka hunguriga ee laagy baadhay shaybaadhka fayruska.

sourceString: The current "gold standard" test involves extracting the genetic material from the sample and analysing it for known genetic markers of the virus.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan shaybaadhka "caadiga ah ee dahabiga ah" waxa uu ku lug leeyahay agabka hide sidaha ee muunada iyo qiimaynta wixii uu ka kooban yahay hide sidaha fayrusku.

sourceString: There is no established test assessing for the virus or antibodies in the blood, although tests are being developed.
targetString: Ma jiro shaybaadh loo sameeyay fayruska ama antiboodhiga dhiiga, inkasta oo shaybaadh loo sameeyay.

sourceString: There is no test to establish immunity to the virus.
targetString: Ma jiraan wax shaybaadh ah oo loo sameeyay difaaca jidhka ee fayruska.

sourceString: Many governments around the world have advised their citizens not to travel unnecessarily amid the pandemic.
targetString: Dawlado badan oo caalamka oo dhan ah ayaa kula taliyay muwaadiniinteeda inayna wax aan daruuri ah u tegin meelaha uu ka jiro safmarka xanuunku.

sourceString: Lots of airlines and package holidays are making it easy for you by waiving cancellation and change fees.
targetString: Diyaarado badan iyo dalxiis badan oo la iibiyay ayaa laguu fududeeyay adiga oo joojinaya iyo la badalay kharashka.

sourceString: Particularly avoid cruise ship travel.
targetString: Gaar ahaan waxa aad iska ilaalisaa maraakiibta dalxiiska.

sourceString: Older travelers and those with underlying health conditions are most at risk and should avoid travel that puts them at risk, such as long plane flights, visits to crowded places, and especially cruises, even outside of severely affected areas.
targetString: Dadka waayeelka ah ee socdaalaya ee qaba xanuunka ayay u badan tahay inay khatar ugu jiraan oo waa inay iska ilaaliyaan socdaalka khatarta gelinaya, sida duulimaadka dheer, booqashada meelaha ay dadku ku badan yihiin, iyo gaar ahaan maraakiibta dalxiiska, iyo xataa aaga caabuqa aadka u badan uu ka jiro.

sourceString: In affected areas, most experts recommend a practice known as social distancing.
targetString: Aaga uu saameeyay, badanaa dadka khabiirada ahi waxay ku taliyaan nidaamka loo yaqaan in la kala fogaado.

sourceString: This means minimising contact with others by keeping a distance of six feet or two meters from them and avoiding gathering together in groups.
targetString: Taasi waxay ka dhigan tahay in la yareeyo isasoo gaadhista dadka kale iyada oo la isku jirsanayo lix fuudh ama laba talaabo iyo in la iska ilaaliyo meelaha ay dadka tirada badan iskugu imanayaan.

sourceString: Some areas permit small groups; others prohibit all group gatherings.
targetString: Aagaga qaar waxay u ogol yihiin dadka yar: meelaha qaarna gebi ahaanba way mamnuucaan isku imaatinka.

sourceString: Measures you are encouraged to take include working from home whenever possible, avoiding crowds and avoiding leaving your home unless absolutely necessary.
targetString: Talaabooyinka la dhiiri geliyo waxaa kamid ah in guriga laga soo shaqeeyo marka ay macquulka tahay, in la iska ilaaliyo meelaha ay dadku iskugu .yimaadaan iyo in la iska ilaaliyo in guriga laga baxo iyada oo daruuri ah moojee

sourceString: If you must go out, try to stay at least 2 meters (6 feet) away from other people.
targetString: Hadii ay khasab tahay in aad baxdo, waxa aad isku daydaa in aad 2 mitir (6 fuudh) u jirsado dadka kale.

sourceString: In many places these measures are required.
targetString: Meelo badan ayay talaabooyinkani waajib ka yihiin.

sourceString: Follow hygiene practices like for flu prevention.
targetString: Waxaad raacdaa nidaamka nadaafada kahortaga hargabka.

sourceString: Frequently wash your hands with soap and warm water, and then dry your hands on a clean towel.
targetString: Waxaad gacmaha ugu maydhaa si joogto ah saabuun iyo biyo diiran, oo kadibna waxa aad ku qalajiysaa tuwaal nadiif ah.

sourceString: As coronaviruses are enveloped viruses, washing your hands with soap kills the virus by disrupting the mostly fat-based viral envelope.
targetString: Coronavirusku waxa weeye xanuun weli la barnaayo, ku maydhida gacmahaaga sabuun iyo biyo waxay u badan tahay inay disho fayruska iyada oo markaa khalkhalinaysa duxda fayrusku uu ku tarmo.

sourceString: Effective hand washing requires rubbing your hands for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: Farxalka wax ku oolka ahi waa in gacmaha la isku xoqo mudo 20 ilbidhiqsi ah.

sourceString: Drying your washed hands physically removes some germs from your skin (so don't skip that step, and don't share towels).
targetString: Inaad qalajiso gacmahaaga aad maydhay waxa ay markaa ka bi'inaysaa gacmaha jeermiska qaar oo maqaarka ku dhagsanayaa (markaa haka boodin talaabaas, oo hana wadaajiga tuwaalada).

sourceString: If soap and water are not available, then use a >60% alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
targetString: Hadii aanad heli karin biyo iyo saabuun, markaa waxaad isticmaashaa gaco nadiifiyaha >60% alkohoosha ah.

sourceString: Alcohol is a quick germ-killer, but it's not quite instant, so this still requires the same 20 seconds of rubbing your hands together, making sure that every single scrap of skin gets wet, and then you have to wait about another minute, for the alcohol to completely dry.
targetString: Alkohooshu waxay dishaa jeermiska, laakiin markaaba maaha, markaa waxaa loo baahan yahay in 20 ilbidhiqsi la isku xoqo gacmaha, iyada oo lagu xaqiijinayo in mar kasta la isku xoqo maqaarka qoyan, markaa lasugo hal daqiiqo oo kale, si markaa alkohooshu gebi ahaanba u qalasho.

sourceString: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with your hands.
targetString: Iska ilaali inaad ku taabato indhahaaga, sanka iyo afkaaga gacmahaaga.

sourceString: Most people touch their faces every few minutes, all day long.
targetString: Badanaa dadku waxay taabtaan wajigooda dhawrkii daqiiqo ee kasta, maalinta oo dhan.

sourceString: Try to do this less, and try to wash your hands before touching your face.
targetString: Waxaad isku daydaa inaad taas yarayso, oo waxa aad maydhaa gacmahaaga kahor inta aanad taaban wajigaaga.

sourceString: Also, try to avoid touching surfaces you don't have to touch in the first place, at least with your bare hands.
targetString: Sidoo kale, isku day inaad iska ilaaliso in aanad taaban meelaha badanaa dadku taataabteen marka horeba, ugu yaraan gacmaha oo aanad waxba ku xidhnayn.

sourceString: Cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and then immediately throw away the tissue and wash your hands.
targetString: Waxaad ku qufacdaa oo aad ku hindhistaa suxulkaaga ama kilinikis, oo markaba tuur kilinikiska oo waxa aad maydhaa gacmahaaga.

sourceString: Don't stand or sit near people who might be sick.
targetString: Ha garan istaagin ama garan fadhiisan dadka ay macquulka tahay inay xanuunsayaan.

sourceString: Stay at least one meter – and ideally two meters (six feet) – away.
targetString: Waxa aad u jirsataa ugu yaraan hal mitir - waxaana wanaagsan laba mitir (lix fuudh) - dadka kale.

sourceString: As a quick way to eyeball this distance, imagine that you and the other person both reached your hands towards each other.
targetString: Qooraanso, oo waxa aad eegtaa in qofka kale hadii aad laacdo ay gacmihiisu is gaadhayaan.

sourceString: Could you touch the other person's hand without taking a step towards that person?
targetString: Miyaad taaban kartaa gacanta qofka kale adiga oo aan markaa talaabo qaadin?

sourceString: If the answer is yes, then you're too close.
targetString: Hadii ay jawaabto tahay haa, markaa aad ayaad ugu dhaw dahay.

sourceString: Clean objects and surfaces that a lot of people touch, such as doorknobs, phones, and television remotes with regular household cleaner.
targetString: Waxa aad nadiifisaa alaabta iyo meelaha badanaa la taabto, sida gacanta albaabka, taleefanada, iyo rimoodka telefiishinka oo isticmaal waxa caadiga ah ee aad ku nadiifsato.

sourceString: Disinfect the surfaces with a suitable disinfectant, such as diluted household bleach.
targetString: Waxa aad jeermiska ka dishaa meelaha la taabto oo isticmaal waxyaabaha caadiga ah ee jeermiska lagu dilo, sida inaad ku darto jaafeel.

sourceString: Stay home when you are sick, and avoid contact with other people until your symptoms are gone.
targetString: Waxa aad joogtaa gurigaaga hadii aad xanuunsanayso, oo waxa aad iska ilaalisaa inaad dadka kale isasoo gaadhaan ilaa inta ay calaamaduhu kaa baaba'ayaan.

sourceString: Do not share personal items that come into contact with saliva, such as toothbrushes, eating utensils, drinks, water bottles, and towels.
targetString: Hala wadaagin agabka dadka kale ee ay candhuufi soo gaadhay, sida cadayga, agabka wax lagu cuno, quruurada biyaha iyo tuwaalada.

sourceString: The practice of serving yourself from a common plate with your own chopsticks, common in China, should be avoided.
targetString: Waa in la iska ilaaliyaa nidaam ah in bilaydhka inta la qaado laga gurto cuntada distida dadka badan ka dhaxaysa, sida badanaa lagu yaqaan Jayniiska.

sourceString: Greet people without touching them.
targetString: Waxa aad salaantaa dadka adiga oo aan taabanaynin.

sourceString: Avoid hugs, kisses, handshakes, fist bumps, and any other contact.
targetString: Waxa aad iska ilaalisaa laab gelinta, dhunkashada, isku dhaca, iyo wixii kale ee taabasho ah.

sourceString: If it's impossible to avoid contact, then wash your hands both before and after.
targetString: Hadii ay macquul tahay, iska ilaalis inaad isasoo gaadhan, kadibna farxalo gacmaha kahor iyo kadibna.

sourceString: It won't protect you from the coronavirus, but it will partially protect you from the flu, which remains a greater risk than COVID-19 in many areas.
targetString: Kaama ilaalinayso coronavirus, laakiin waxay wax kamid ah hargabka ayay kaa ilaalin doontaa, taas oo khatar badan marka loo eega meelo badan oo uu ka jiro COVID-19.

sourceString: This also saves you from unnecessary worry if you get the flu and think it might be the coronavirus.
targetString: Looma baahna inaad aad u warwarto hadii aad qaado hargab iyo inaad ka fikirto inuu noqon karo coronavirus.

sourceString: If you are elderly or otherwise in a high-risk group and can be vaccinated for pneumonia, get that vaccination.
targetString: Hadii dadka waayeelka ah ama sida kale khatarta badan ugu jiraa laga talaali karo xanuunka sanbabka, waxa aad usoo qaadaa talaalka.

sourceString: It won't protect you from viral pneumonia from COVID-19, but some COVID-19 patients have died of bacterial pneumonia that attacked their weakened lungs, so a pneumonia vaccination could save your life.
targetString: Kaana ilaalinta doonto fayruska sanbabka ee COVID-19, laakiin bukaanka qaar COVID-19 waxay ku dhinteen baakteeriyada sanbabka ee arkaa weerarta sanbabka diciifka ah, markaa talaalka xanuunka sanbabku waxa uu badbaadin karaa nolosha.

sourceString: Wearing masks is recommended for those who are suspected of carrying of disease and those who are in close contact with those infected.
targetString: In la xidho waji gashad ayaa lagula taliyaa dadka looga shakiyo inay qabaan xanuunka iyo daadka u dhawaaday dadka qaba xanuunka.

sourceString: For those who are asymptomatic, the WHO does not recommend masks, though some national governments do.
targetString: Dadka qaba calaamadaha xanuunka, WHO waxay ku talinaysaa inayna xidhan waji gashad, in kasta oo dawladoodu ay sidaa farayso.

sourceString: Wearing a mask of some kind is required in some countries and cities in an effort to reduce community transmission.
targetString: Xidhashada waji gashadka qaar ayaa dalalka qaar waajib ka ah iyo magaalooyinka qaar si markaa loo yareeyo faafitaanka xanuunka.

sourceString: There are worldwide shortages of surgical masks.
targetString: Caalamka oo dhan waxaa ka yaraaay waji gashadka qaliinka.

sourceString: If you do wear a mask, make sure to use it correctly.
targetString: Hadii aad xidhanayso waji gashad, waxa aad xaqiijisaa inaad sida saxda ah u isticmaasho.

sourceString: The mask should cover your nose and mouth and fit without gaps.
targetString: Waji gashadku waa inuu ku xidhmaa sanka iyo afka oo uu buuxiyaa inta u dhaxaysa.

sourceString: Wash your hands before putting on the mask and avoid touching the mask while wearing it.
targetString: Farxalo kahor inta aanad xidhan waji gashadka oo waxa aad iska ilaalisaa inaad tabato waji gashadka inta aad xidhan tahay.

sourceString: If you do touch it, wash your hands immediately afterwards.
targetString: Hadii aad taabato, markaba farxalo.

sourceString: When the mask becomes damp, discard and replace it.
targetString: Marka uu waji gashadku uskagoobo, iska tuur oo mid kale ku badalo.

sourceString: Remove it from the back, throw it away, and then wash your hands.
targetString: Waxa aad ka saartaa xaga danbe, oo tuur, kadibna farxalo.

sourceString: Remember that masks are not a substitute for good hygiene: continue to wash your hands frequently.
targetString: Waxa aad xasuusataa in waji gashadku aanu badal u ahayn nadaafada wanaagsan: waxaad sii wadaa inaad si joogto ah u farxalato.

sourceString: Don't stock up on masks if you don't need them.
targetString: Ha rasaysan waji gashadyo hadii aanad u baahnayn.

sourceString: Mask shortages mean that healthcare workers are having trouble getting a hold of masks, which puts everyone at risk.
targetString: Yaraanta waji gashadku waxay ka dhigan tahay in shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaad ay ku adag tahay inay helaan waji gashad, taas oo qof kasta khatar gelinaya.

sourceString: That includes N95 respirators, which are not recommended for the general public – these are specialist equipment which must be fitted to be optimally effective.
targetString: Waxaa kamid ah waji gashadka N95, taas oo aan lagu talinin inay shacabka oo dhan xidhaan - waxaa jira agab gaar ah oo ay tahay inuu si wanaagsan qofka ugu xidhmo oo si wax ku ool ah looga faa'idaysan karaa.

sourceString: Leave them for healthcare workers.
targetString: Waxa aad u daysaa shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka.

sourceString: Avoid crowded areas, especially enclosed areas without much air circulation, such as conferences, performances, shopping malls, public transportation, and religious services.
targetString: Waxa aad iska ilaalisaa meelaha ay dadku ku badan yihiin, gaar ahaan aaga xidhan ee hawada badani ayna wareegeynin, sida shirarka, bandhigyada, moolashada, gaadiidka shacabka, iyo isku imaatinada diimeed.

sourceString: Events which involve a large scale gathering of people, from religious pilgrimages to music concerts, are being canceled worldwide, in an effort to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: Munaasabadaha ay dadka badan iskugu imanayaan, xajka diinta ilaa bandhig faneedyada, waa la joojiyay caalamka oo dhan, si loo xakameeyo faafitaanka fayruska.

sourceString: Tourist attractions, businesses, and transportation may be closed, especially in affected countries.
targetString: Dalxiiska, ganacsiyada, iyo gaadiidka waa la xidhay, gaar ahaan dalalka uu sameeyay.

sourceString: Some canceled events, especially performances, sporting events, and classes, are being moved online, which means you can experience them without traveling.
targetString: Munaasabadaha la joojiyay qaar, gaar ahaan bandhigyada, munaasabada isboortiga, iyo fasalada, waxaa loo wareejiyay online, taas oo ka dhigan in aad heli karto adiga oo aan halkaa tegin.

sourceString: At petrol/gas stations, use gloves or wipe down the handle with a disinfectant wipe if you can.
targetString: Kaalmaha/meelaha shidaalka laga qaado, isticmaal golofis ama waxa aad masaxdaa gacanta oo aad ku masaxdaa kilinikiska jeermiska dila.

sourceString: After filling up, clean your hands with hand sanitizer.
targetString: Kadib marka aad ku shubato, ku farxalo gacmo nadiifiye.

sourceString: The U.S. and Canadian governments recommend avoiding travel by cruise ship.
targetString: Dawladaha Maraykanka iyo Kanada waxay ku talinayaan in aad iska ilaaliso maraakiibta dalxiiska.

sourceString: Infections spread easily on board, and medical care is limited.
targetString: Markabka dushiisa si yar oo fudud ayuu fayrusku ugu baahaa, oo waxaana xadidan daryeelka caafimaad ee laga heli karo.

sourceString: Amid a cruise ship outbreak, quarantines and docking are challenging partly due to the large number of people aboard.
targetString: Safmarka markabka dalxiiska, karantiimada iyo in meel lagu soo xidho markabka ayaa adkaata maadaama oo dad badan ay saaran yihiin.

sourceString: Even cruise ships without confirmed cases have been denied permission to dock due to virus fears, and in the high-profile case of the Diamond Princess in Japan, hundreds of people were infected on the ship.
targetString: Xataa maraakiibka dalxiiska ee aan la xaqiijin cid saaran oo qabta xanuunka waxaa loo diidaa inay soo xidhaan iyada oo laga baqanayo fayruska, oo waxaa kamid ah sheekooyinka caanka ah Diamond Princess ee Jabaan, boqolaal dad ah ayaa iyaga oo saaran markabka qaaday.

sourceString: If you believe you may be infected, call a hospital or local emergency medical services instead of going in person to avoid infecting others.
targetString: Hadii aad u aragto in aad qabto xanuunka, waxa aad la hadashaa isbitaalka ama adeegyada caafimaadka xaalada degdeg ah halka aad adiga oo socda aad ka tegi lahayd adiga oo qaba xanuunka oo aad dadka kale u qaadsiin lahayd.

sourceString: Mention your symptoms and travel history.
targetString: Waxaad u sheegtaa calaamadahaaga iyo inaad socdaashay.

sourceString: Wear a medical mask and follow the instructions of authorities and doctors.
targetString: Waxa aad xidhataa waji gashadka caafimaadka oo waxaad raacdaa tilmaamaha maamulka iyo dhakhaatiirta.

sourceString: See also: Flight and health
targetString: Eeg sidoo kale: Duulimaadka iyo caafimaadka

sourceString: On a plane, follow the same hygiene practices as anywhere else: wash hands frequently, or use alcohol-based hand sanitizer if it's not convenient to leave your seat, and avoid touching your face.
targetString: Diyaarada dusheesha, waxa aad raacdaa nidaamkii nadaafada mid lamid ah meelaha kale: u maydho gacmahaaga si joogto ah, ama isticmaal gacmo nadiifiyaha alkohoosha leh hadii ayna adiga kuu haboonayn inaad ka kacdo kursigaaga, oo waxa  aad iska ilaalisaa taabashada wajiga.

sourceString: Researchers have found that passengers in window seats have less risk of contact with sick people.
targetString: Daraasadaha ayaa muujiya in dadka rakaabka ah ee daaqada fadhiyaa inay ka yar tahay khatartooda ay ku qaadayaan xanuunka dad kale.

sourceString: Try to book a window seat, and avoid moving around the cabin during the flight.
targetString: Waxaad isku daydaa inaad daaqada fadhiisato, oo waxa aad iska ilaalisaa inaad dhax socsocoto diyaarada intay hawada ku jirto.

sourceString: After washing your hands and before sitting down, use disinfectant wipes to wipe down the area around your seat.
targetString: Farxalo kahor iyo marka aad fadhiisanayso, isticmaal kilinikiska jeermis disha si aad ugu masaxdao aaga kursigaaga.

sourceString: Wipe hard surfaces, and if your seat is leather you can wipe that too.
targetString: Waxaad masaxdaa meelaha adag oo dhan, iyo hadii uu kusigaagu uu yahay leedar masax laftiisa.

sourceString: Don't wipe a cloth seat, as the moisture can make transmission easier.
targetString: Ma masixin kuraasta marada ah, maadaama oo qoyaanku ii si yar oo fudud ugu gudbi karo.

sourceString: When using disinfectant wipes, follow the instructions on the packaging.
targetString: Marka aad isticmaalayso kilinikiska jeermis dila, waxa aad raacdaa tilmaamaha bushqada ku yaala.

sourceString: And remember, viruses enter through your mouth, nose, and eyes – wiping down the area doesn't hurt, but it's not a substitute for proper hygiene.
targetString: Xasuuso, fayrusku waxa uu galaa afkaaga, sankaaga, iyo indhahaaga - waxa aad masaxdaa meelaha aan ku xanuunaynin, laakiin taasi ma badasho nadaafada munaasabka ah.

sourceString: Wash your hands and avoid touching your face.
targetString: Maydh gacmahaaga oo waxa aad iska ilaalisaa taabashad wajigaaga.

sourceString: And use a tissue to touch the touch screen or other controls.
targetString: Isticmaal kilinikis si aad ugu taabato shaashada ama rimoodka.

sourceString: When using the lavatory, use paper towels to turn off the faucet and open the door, then throw them away.
targetString: Marka aad isticmaasho suuliga, isticmaal kilinikis si aad u dhaadhiciso ama aad u furto alabaabka iyo qasabada, oo kadibna tuur.

sourceString: Airlines in affected areas are taking steps to reduce transmission and keep passengers safe.
targetString: Diyaarada aaga uu sameeyay waxay qaadeen talaabooyin ay ku yaraynayaan faafitaanka oo ay markaa ku ilaalinayaan amaanka rakaabka.

sourceString: For instance, these may include cleaning facilities more frequently, allowing flight attendants to wear masks, and serving prepackaged instead of freshly heated meals.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, waxaa kamid noqon kara kuwaas in la nadiifiyo xarumaha mar kasta, inay shaqaalaha diyaaradu ay xidhaan waji gashad, iyo inay bixiyaan cunto sii moorsan halka ay ka noqon lahayd cunto daray ah oo la diirinayo.

sourceString: If a group of passengers is connecting from an area with a severe outbreak, the flight attendants may be able to seat them away from the rest of the passengers (and if you were recently in a high-risk area, consider telling the flight attendants for this reason).
targetString: Hadii koox rakaabka ahi ay ka walaac qabaan aaga uu sida balaadhan ugu faafay, shaqaalaha diyaarada ayaa markaa ka fogayn kara qofkaa rakaabka ah rakaabka kale (iyo hadii ay jireen aagag khatar ah oo dhawaa, waxa aad isku daydaa inaad u sheegto shaqaalaha diyaarada sababta).

sourceString: You may be prohibited from changing seats on the flight.
targetString: Waxaa lagaa mamnuuci karaa inaad badalato kursiga adiga oo saaran diyaarada.

sourceString: This is so that, if someone on the flight turns out to be infected, the authorities can track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine.
targetString: Hadii ay sidaasi dhacdo, hadii la ogaado in qof kamid ah rakaabka diyaaradu inuu qabo, maamuka waxay daba geli doonaan dadka fadhiyay meelaha u dhaw qofkaas oo way baadhi doonaan ama karantiimo ayay gelin doonaan.

sourceString: COVID-19 is treated by relieving symptoms and preventing complications.
targetString: COVID-19 waxaa lagu daweeyaa iyada oo la sheegayo calaamadaha oo laga hortagayo mushkiladiisa.

sourceString: There is no vaccine or specific treatment for the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Malaha talaal ama daawayn gaar ah novel coronavirus.

sourceString: Research into a vaccine or specific antiviral drug is underway.
targetString: Waxaa la wadaa daraasada talaalka ama dawooyinkiisa fayruska.

sourceString: There are a variety of trials using HIV medications and other novel antiviral medications for treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: Waxaa jira tijaabooyin kala duwan iyada oo la isticaalayo dawooyinka HIV iyo dawooyinka fayruska novel ee kale si loogu daweeyo COVID-19.

sourceString: Mild symptoms may be relieved by taking paracetamol (acetaminophen).
targetString: Calaamadaha yaryar waxaa lagu dawayn karaa iyada oo la qadaanayo baraasitimool (acetaminpohen).
