sourceString: If you are infected with COVID-19, countries will isolate you until several consecutive tests for COVID-19 are negative.
targetString: Hadii aad qaado COVID-19, dalalka way ku karantimayn doonaa ilaa inta lagaa qaadayo shaybaadho badan oo markaa lagaa waawayo COVID-19.

sourceString: If you have been in close contact with someone infected with COVID-19, many countries will quarantine you for 14 days since the last exposure and monitor you for signs and symptoms.
targetString: Hadii aad isku dhawaateen cid qabta caabuqa COVID-19, dalal badan ayaa ku karantimayn kara 14 maalmood markii aad isasoo gaadheen cida qabta oo waxa ay la soconayaan wixii calaamado ah ama astaamo ah ee aad leedahay.

sourceString: Some countries will also test you even if you don't have symptoms.
targetString: Dalalka qaar ayaa sidoo kale ku baadhaya hataa hadii aanad lahayn wax calaamado ah.

sourceString: In many countries, the healthcare system has been stretched to the point of not being able to handle the sheer number of patients, and there is a chance you may be refused treatment due to the lack of available medical staff, supplies or equipment.
targetString: Dalal badan, nidaamka daryeelka caafimaadka waxaa la gaadhsiiyay heer ayna qaadi karin tirada bukaanka, oo waxaa jira macquuliyad ah in laguu diido daawaynta maadaama oo ayna jirin shaqaale caafimaad, agabkii qalabkii.

sourceString: Many countries have shut down or severely limited flights, ships, and border crossings, especially to and from affected areas.
targetString: Dalal badan waxa ay xidheen ama aad u xadideen duulimaadyadii, maraakiibtii, iyo kasoo gudubkii xuduudaha, gaar ahaan aaga aadka uu u sameeyay.

sourceString: Even more countries have imposed restrictions on arriving travelers, either barring entry (maybe with an exception for local citizens and permanent residents) or requiring you to be quarantined, typically for 14 days.
targetString: Xataa dalal badan ayaa soo roday xadidaad marka ay dadku gaadhan, kuwaas oo caqabad saaran soo gelida (marka laga reebo dadka deegaanka iyo haysta deganaanshaha) ama waxaa loo baahan karaa in lagu karantimeeyo, caadiyan 14 maalmood.

sourceString: Even if a mandatory quarantine is not imposed, you may be asked to "self-quarantine" by staying at home and not interacting with other people.
targetString: Xataa hadii aan lagugu soo rogin karantiimada waajibka ah, waxaa lagaa dalban karaa "inaad naftaada karantimayso" adiga oo joogaya gurigaaga oo aad dadka kale dhax galaynin.

sourceString: The most severe restrictions are on travellers who have recently been to affected areas, but increasingly many countries are applying them to incoming travellers overall.
targetString: Xadidaada ugu daran ee dadka socdaalaya waxaa uu saaran yahay dadka dhawaan u socdaalay meelaha uu aadka u sameeyay, laakiin dadka badan ayaa ku dabaqa dadka socdaalaya ee dalka soo galaya.

sourceString: Some countries have even prohibited all or almost all foreigners from entry or limited the ability of local citizens and residents to leave.
targetString: Dalal badan waxa ay mamnuuceen dhamaan ama badanaa dhamaan ajaanibku inay soo galaan ama waxay xadideen awooda dadka deegaanka iyo dadka meesha dgan ay kaga bixi karaan dalka.

sourceString: What are the affected areas?
targetString: Halkee weeye meelaha uu sameeyay?

sourceString: Well, this is a fast-changing situation, and each country/region/organization has its own list of what areas are subject to restrictions.
targetString: Runtii, waxaa weeye xaalad aad isku badbaadaysa, oo deegaan,/dal/hay'ada kastaa waxa ay haysataa liis u gaar ah oo inta ay ku waajibto ah xadidaadu.

sourceString: The city of Wuhan is on every list and the rest of mainland China is on most.
targetString: Magaalada Wuhan cid kasta liiskeeda way ku jirtaa iyo inta kale ee Jayna badanaa.

sourceString: Other areas that are often included: France, Germany, Hong Kong, Iran, Italy, Japan, Macau, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, the Schengen Area as a whole, and sometimes various others.
targetString: Aagaga kale waxaa badanaa kamid ah: Faransiiska, Jermany, Hong Kong, Iiraan, Talyaaniga, Jabaan, Macau, Singaaboor, Koonfurta Kuuriya, Isbayn, Taywaan, Ingiriiska, Maraykanka, Aaga Schengen gebi ahaanba, iyo mararka qaar meelo kale oo kala duwan.

sourceString: Some countries have imposed restrictions based on citizenship or residency from severely affected areas.
targetString: Dalalka qaar ayaa xadidaad kusoo rogay dadka u dhashay ama degan aaga uu aadka u sameeyay.

sourceString: A detailed list of entry restrictions is maintained by the IATA.
targetString: Faahfaahinta liiska xadidaada soo gelida waxaa haya IATA.

sourceString: It doesn't cover all the restrictions, but it's still useful.
targetString: Mawada aha dhamaan xadidaadaha, laakiin weli wax badan ayay taraysaa.

sourceString: Keep up to date—the outbreak and the travel restrictions are changing rapidly.
targetString: Waxaad la socotaa - safmarka iyo xadidaada safarka ee sida shakhsaha ah isku badala.

sourceString: For travel in the near future, consider making refundable reservations in case the changing situation forces you to change your plans.
targetString: Wixii socdaalka mustaqbalka dhaw ah, waxa aad ka fikirtaa in aad kharashkaaga lasoo noqoto hadii ay dhacdo in xaalada is badalaysaa ay kugu khasabto inaad badasho qorshahaaga.

sourceString: Avoid buying tickets with a connection in an affected area – even changing planes can make you subject to restrictions.
targetString: Waxa aad iska ilaalisaa inaad iibsato tigidh aaga uu aadka u sameeyay ah - xataa hadii badalka diyaaraduhu ay kugu waajibin karaan xadidaad.

sourceString: Flights may get canceled with little notice, either due to the disease's spread and ever-changing entry restrictions, or simply because fewer people are flying and airlines are having trouble filling seats.
targetString: Duulimaadyada waa la joojin karaa iyada oo wargelinta la bixiyay ay yar tahay faafitaanka xanuunka dartiis oo xataa waxaa is badali kara xadidaada gelitaanka, ama kaliya maadaama oo ay dad yari raacayaan diyaaradaha, oo ay diyaarada ku adkaato inay kuraasta wada kirayso.

sourceString: You might also be delayed for hours upon arrival waiting for temperature checks and related procedures and paperwork, or even get quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Waxaa dhici karta in saacado badan aad meesha joogto marka aad timaado si lagaaga qaado heerkulkaaga iyo wixii kale ee la xidhiidha iyo waraaqaha, oo waxaa xataa lagu karantiimayn karaa laba todobaad.

sourceString: Be prepared for the possibility of disruption to your travel plans, especially if traveling internationally.
targetString: Waxa aad u diyaar garawdaa khalkhal ku yimaada qorshahaaga socdaalka, gaar ahaan hadii aad meel caalami ah u socdaalayso.

sourceString: Even if you're nowhere near affected areas there's a risk that you'll have to stay at the destination longer than planned if you've shared a building or vessel with an infected person.
targetString: Xataa hadii aanad ku dhawayn aaga uu saameeyay waxaa jira khatar ah in aan joogto mudo dheer meesha aad ku maqan tahay hadii aad la wadaagtay dhisme ama markab qof qaba xanuunka.

sourceString: For example, in late February an Italian doctor on vacation in Costa Adeje (Canary Islands) was diagnosed with COVID-19, and as a result all the guests in the hotel he stayed at were quarantined.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, dhamaadkii Febraayo dhakhaatiirta Talyaaniga ayaa isaga oo fasax ku maqan Costa Adeje (Jasiirada Canary) laga heley COVID-19, oo waxa ay keentay in dhamaan dadkii hudheelka daganaa in karantiin la geliyo.

sourceString: Lockdowns and other internal restrictions
targetString: Bandooda iyo xadidaada gudaha

sourceString: Some countries and regions, especially severely affected ones, are implementing emergency lockdowns and restrictions on people's movements and activities, even for those who haven't recently been abroad.
targetString: Dalalka iyo deegaanada qaar, gaar ahaan kuwa uu aadka u sameeyay, waxay dhaqan gelinayaan xaalad degdeg ah oo bandoo ahiyo xadiida isu socodka iyo hawlaha dadka, xataa kuwa aan dhawaanahan dalka dibadiisa u socdaalin.

sourceString: These include the temporary reintroduction of some border controls, restrictions on travel within the country, closing or limiting service at restaurants and other establishments, banning large public events, and in the most severe cases prohibiting people from leaving the house except for essential reasons.
targetString: Kuwaas waxaa kamid ah in si kumeel gaadh ah loo sameeyay xakamayn xuduudaha ah, xadidaad socdaalka dalka, xidhitaanka ama xadidaad adeegyada maqaaxiyaha iyo meelaha kale, in la mamnuuc isku imaatinka dadka badan, iyo marka ay ugu daran tahay in la mamnuuco inay dadku ka baxaan gurigooda marka laga tago wixii hawlo daruuri ah.

sourceString: Beyond government restrictions, individual establishments are shutting their doors and cancelling events to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: Marka la dhaafo xadidaada dawlada, waxaa la xidhayaa wixii meelaha dadka ah albaabkooda oo waxaa la joojinayaa munaasabadaha si la iskugu dayo in lagu yareeyo faafitaanka fayruska.

sourceString: In China, there are extensive restrictions on transportation and activity, which vary widely by province, city, and even by district or village.
targetString: Jayna, waxaa jira xadidaad aad u wayn oo gaadiidka iyo hawlaha ah, taasoo ay ku kala duwan yihin degmooyinku, magaalooyinku, iyo deegaanada ama tuulooyinku.

sourceString: Many governments recommend against traveling to China at this time.
targetString: Dawlado badan ayaa ku talinayaa in wakhti xaadirkan aan loo socdaalin Jayna.

sourceString: If you have no choice, do your research and get up-to-date information about the local situation wherever you are going.
targetString: Hadii ay kugu khasab tahay, waxaas samaysaa daraasad oo waxa aad heshaa macluumaadka ku saabsan xaaladaada deegaanka marka aad awoodo.

sourceString: People who have traveled to Hubei face particularly severe restrictions.
targetString: Dadka u socdaalay Hubei waxa si gaar ah loo saaraa xadidaad.

sourceString: Examples of restrictions that you may encounter in some parts of China (this is not an exhaustive list):
targetString: Tusaale ahaan xadidaada lagu arko karo qaybo kamid ah Jayna (tani maala liis dheer):

sourceString: 14-day quarantine, self-quarantine, or COVID-19 test upon arrival from other parts of China or from other countries, at your expense
targetString: Mudo 14 maalmood oo karantiimo ah, ama shaybaadhka COVID-19 marka laga yimaado meelo kale oo Jayna ah ama dalal kale, oo qofku uu kharashkiisa iska bixinayo

sourceString: questions about your travel and medical history (lying can get you years in prison)
targetString: Su'aalo ku saabsan taariikhda socdaalka iyo caafimaadka (hadii aad been sheegto waxa aad ku mutaysan kartaa hal sano oo xabsi ah)

sourceString: mandatory registration using an online or paper form
targetString: duwaanka waajibka ah iyada oo la isticmaalayo foomam online ah ama waraaqo

sourceString: requirement to wear a face mask in public
targetString: waajibaad in la xidho ah waji gashad marka meelaha dadku iskugu yimaadaan la joogo

sourceString: people who have been outside of China within 14 days not allowed into public places like malls
targetString: dadka u socdaalay meel ka baxsan Jayna 14 maalmood looma ogola inay yimaadaan meelaha dadku iskugu yimaadaan sida moolasha.

sourceString: shops only accept mobile payments, not cash
targetString: kaliya waxaad wax ku iibsataa lacagta mobil-ka ee la ogol yahay, maaga lacag cadaan ah

sourceString: restaurants, transportation and other establishments refusing service to non-Chinese citizens
targetString: maqaaxiyaha, gaadiidka, iyo adeegyada kale waxay diidaan inay u shaqeeyaan dadka u dhashay Jayna

sourceString: many forms of transportation reduced or shut down
targetString: noocyo badan oo gaadiid ah ayaa la yareeyay ama la xidhay

sourceString: mandatory real-name registration for public transit cards
targetString: magaca rasmi ah oo lagu qoro kaadhka lagu raacayo gaadiidka oo waajib ah

sourceString: access in and out of a town, village, or city completely blocked
targetString: gebi ahaanba waxaa la xidhay wadooyinka magaalada, tuulooyinka, ama caasimada

sourceString: non-resident visitors prohibited from entering apartment complexes
targetString: dadka aan deganayn waa ka mamnuuc inay soo galaan dhismayaasha guryaha ah

sourceString: only allowed to go outside once every two days to get supplies
targetString: kaliya waxaa la ogol yahay in banaanka loo baxo labadii jeer maalin

sourceString: businesses, activities, and attractions closed
targetString: ganacsiyada, hawlaha, iyo is dhaxgalka ayaa la xidhay

sourceString: businesses need local government permission to re-open
targetString: ganacsigu waxa ay u baahan yihiin ruqsad dawlada hoose ah si dib loogu furo

sourceString: restaurants (if they are even open) require a minimum distance between customers
targetString: maqaaxiyaha (hadii dib loo furo) waxaa looga baahan yahay inay dadku isku jirsadaan masaafada ugu yar

sourceString: selling substandard face masks has a maximum sentence of life imprisonment
targetString: iibinta waji gashad ka hooseeya heerka amaanku waxa lagu mudanayaa ugu badnaan xabsi daa'in

sourceString: As of mid-March 2020, Europe is the epicenter of the epidemic, and many European countries have closed their borders to international travel - only border commuters and freight are allowed to cross.
targetString: Badhtamihii Maarso 2020, Yurub waxay noqotay xarunta safmarka, oo dalal badan oo Yurub ahi waxa ay xidheen xuduudahooda caalamiga ah - kaliya xuduudaha bulshada iyo maraakiibta ayaa loo ogolaa inay soo galaan.

sourceString: Also businesses other than food stores and pharmacies are closed, and public transport has been reduced or stopped.
targetString: Sidoo kale ganacsiyada kale ee aan ahayn tukaamada cuntada iyo farmasiyada waa la xidhay, oo gaadiidka shacabka waa la yareeyay ama la joojiyay.

sourceString: In the worst affected countries including Italy, Spain and France, lockdowns like in China in January, have been implemented.
targetString: Dalalka uu sida xun u sameeyay oo ay ku jiraan Talyaaniga, Isbayn, iyo Faransiiska, sidii Jayna badooda loogu soo rotay Janaayo, ayaa lagu soo rogay.

sourceString: As well the EU has closed its outer borders.
targetString: Sidoo kale EU-du waxay xidhatay xuduudaheeda.

sourceString: COVID-19 is prevalent also in North America.
targetString: COVID-19 waxa uu sidoo kale ku faafay Waqooyiga Maraykanka

sourceString: The borders between Canada, the U.S., and Mexico are closed to non-essential travel, and in many areas bans on big gatherings are in effect (this means places like restaurants are closed, and events are canceled).
targetString: Xuduuda u dhaxaysa Kanada, Maraykanka, iyo Meksiko ayaa laga xidhay wixii aan ahayn dadka daruuriga ah, oo meelo badan waxaa la mamnuucay in dad badan isku yimaadaan aaga uu saameeyay (taasi waxay ka dhigan tahay meelaha sida maqaaxiga in la xidhayo, oo munaasabada la joojiyay).

sourceString: Numerous state, county, and municipal jurisdictions have issued stay-at-home orders that require all nonessential businesses to close.
targetString: Gobolo badan, degmooyin, iyo dawlade hoose ayaa soo saaray amar ah jooga guriga kuwaas oo waajibiyay in la xidho dhamaan ganacsiyada aan daruuriga ahayn.

sourceString: With lots of flights canceled, warnings issued, and restrictions imposed, flying in the time of coronavirus can be a challenge.
targetString: Maadaama oo duulimaadyo badan la joojiyay, arrimaha digniinta leh, iyo xadidaadaha lagu soo rogay, duuliyaadka wakhtiga coronavirus ayaa dhib badan.

sourceString: Some routes are not possible.
targetString: Meelaha qaar macquul maaha in la tago.

sourceString: Others will require more inconvenient connections than usual—multiple stops and long waits between flights.
targetString: Kuwa kale waxa ay u baahanayaa in laga soo wareego meel aan haboonayn si ka duwan sidii hore - meelo badan oo la joogsado iyo mudo dheer oo duulimaadka la sugo.

sourceString: In some cases that means more expensive tickets.
targetString: Mararka qaar waxay taasi ka dhigan tahay tigidho aad qaali u ah.

sourceString: On the other hand, the good news is that many flights are cheaper than usual due to decreased demand, and there's a decent chance you'll get an empty seat next to you.
targetString: Dhanka kale, warka wanaagsani waxaa weeye in tigidhada diyaaraduhu ay ka jaban yihiin intii hore maadaama oo uu dalabku hoos u dhacay, waxaana jirta fursad badan oo ah inuu kursiga kugu xigaa uu banaanaado.

sourceString: Build in extra time for your connections, especially if transferring from an international flight to a domestic flight and especially if your itinerary involves a country that's seriously affected.
targetString: Wakhti dheer inay kugu qaadato u kala wareega diyaaradaha, gaar ahaan marka aad duulimaad caalami ah uga wareegayso duulimaad dalka gudihiisa ah iyo gaar ahaan hadii ay tahay dalalka uu aadka u sameeyay.

sourceString: Screenings, temperature checks, extra paperwork, and the associated waiting around can add minutes or hours before you're allowed to continue on your journey.
targetString: Shaybaadhka, eegitaanka heerkulka, waraaqaha dheeraadka ah, iyo sugitaanka la xidhiidha aaya markaa kordhinaya daqiiqadaha ama saacadaha kahor inta aan laguu ogolaan inaad sii wadato socdaalkaaga.

sourceString: You may find it harder than usual to buy a ticket to or from a destination subject to warnings and restrictions.
targetString: Waxa kugu adkaan kara si ka duwan sidii hore inaad iibsato tigidh aad ku tagayso ama kaga imanayso meelaha laga digay ama xadidaadu ka taagan tahay.

sourceString: This is a real concern if you're trying to get out of an affected area.
targetString: Waxaa jira walaac hadii aad isku dayayso inaad kasoo baxdo aaga caabuqu ka jiro.

sourceString: For instance, most aggregators are not selling tickets from China to the United States (presumably to avoid falling afoul of restrictions and being on the hook for a passenger's flight out).
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, badanaa lama iibinayo tigidhada Jayna ilaa Maraykanka (taas oo la doonayo in la iskaga ilaaliyo in laga horyimaado xadidaada iyo in lagu xanibmo duulimaadka kasoo baxa).

sourceString: To buy a ticket for an itinerary like this, you may have to contact the airline or use a lesser-known aggregator.
targetString: Ka iibsiga tigidhku waa sidii oo kale, inaad la xidhiidhi diyaarada ama aad isticmaasho kireeya.

sourceString: Another possibility is to buy two separate tickets (for instance, a ticket from China to Cambodia and a second ticket from Cambodia to the U.S.), but be careful you won't get quarantined or lose your luggage in between.
targetString: Waxa kale oo aad samayn kartaa waa inaad iibsato laba tigidh oo kala duwan (tusaale ahan, tigidh Jayna ilaa Kamboodhiya ah iyo tigidh labaad oo Kaamboodhiya ilaa Maraykanka ah), laakiin waxa aad ka taxadirtaa in inta u dhaxaysa lagu karantimeeyo ama alaabta aad waydo.

sourceString: Connecting flights can be a problem.
targetString: Diyaarada diyaarada kale looga wareegayo aaya dhib ah.

sourceString: The risk of getting stuck in the connection city is higher than usual right now, due to delays for screening and testing as well as extensive cancellations.
targetString: Waxaa jirta khatar ah in aan ku xanibanto magaalo in badan intii caadiga ahayn iminka, maadaama oo uu dib u dhac kuugu imanay ah shaybaadhka iyo baadhitaanka iyo sidoo kale in la joojin karo.

sourceString: Connecting in an affected area may lead to entry restrictions later on, and if you've been in an affected area recently some countries won't even let you change planes.
targetString: Diyaarad diyaar uga wareega aaga uu saameeyay waxa uu horseedi karaa in hadhaw la xadido soo gelida, ama hadii aad ku sugnayd aaga uu sameeyay ee dalalka qaar kuuma ogolaanayaan in aad xataa badalato diyaarada.

sourceString: On certain itineraries there is a risk of getting quarantined somewhere along the way.
targetString: Meelaha qaar waxaa jirta khatar ah in lagu geliyo karantiimo meelaha aad marayso ah.

sourceString: So book a direct flight if you can, and if not, think carefully about where to connect.
targetString: Markaa waxa aad goosataa duulimaad toos ah hadii aad karto, hadii ayna suurto gal ahayn, waxa aad ka taxadirtaa halka aad diyaarada uga wareegeyso.

sourceString: In uncertain times, plans can change.
targetString: Mararka qaar, qorshaha ayaa is bedeli kara.

sourceString: Many embassies and consulates have evacuated nonessential staff, and some have shut down operations completely.
targetString: Safaarado badan iyo qusliyado badan ayaa qixiyay shaqaalaha aan daruuriga ahayn, iyo qaarna waxa ay leeyihiin shaqada xidhitaanka.

sourceString: Emergency assistance should still be available, though it's possible you may have to contact a further-away consulate if your local one has shut down.
targetString: Waxaa la heli karaa xaalada degdeg ah kaalmadeeda, in kasta oo ay noqonayso inaad la xidhiidho qunsuliyad meel fog ah hadii ta deegaankaagu ay xidhan tahay.

sourceString: If you have been stranded due to the pandemic, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, arrange an emergency loan so you can buy a ticket, or provide an emergency passport.
targetString: Hadii aad ku xanibantay safmarka, qunsuliyada kuugu dhaw ayaa ku caawin karta inaad hesho duulimaad ilaa dalkaaga aad usoo raacdo, waxa aad heli karaa dayn xaalada degdeg ah si markaa aad u iibsato tigidh, ama aad u hesho baasboorka xaalada degdeg ah.

sourceString: At the very least they can keep you informed about the local situation and notify you about recently introduced travel requirements and restrictions.
targetString: Waxa aad ugu yaraan kala socan kartaa xaaladaada deegaankaaga oo waxaad geli kartaa wargelinta shuruudaha iyo xadidaada socdaalka ee soo baxay.

sourceString: Ordinary consular services such as visa and passport processing may be suspended or restricted to urgent need, depending on the location and the consulate.
targetString: Adeegyada qunsiyada caadiga ah ee sida fiisaha iyo baasboorka ayaa la joojin karaa ama la xadidi karaan sidii looga baahdo, taas oo ku xidhan goobta iyo qunsuliyada.

sourceString: Although some people call the disease "Wuhan pneumonia" (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), "Wuhan disease", or "Chinese virus", the use of these terms is considered racist in China and by many people of Chinese origin.
targetString: Inkasta oo dadka qaar ay u yaqaanaan xanuunka "Safmarka Wuhan" (Chinese), "Xanuunka Wuhan", ama "fayruska Jayna" isticmaalka kalmadahan waxaa loo arkaa inay hayb sooc yihiin loola jeedo Jayniiska iyo dadka badan oo kasoo jeedo Jayna.

sourceString: It is still common to refer the disease as "Wuhan pneumonia" or "Chinese virus" in places like Hong Kong and Taiwan.
targetString: Waxaa caadiyan loo yaqaanaa "safmarka Wuhan" ama "Fayruska Jayna" meelaha sida Hong Kong iyo Taywaan.

sourceString: To be safe, use location-neutral terms when referring to the disease, such as "COVID-19", "novel coronavirus", or just "the virus" or "the pandemic".
targetString: Si aad maan u noqoto, waxa aad isticmaashaan kalmado deegaanka ah oo dhexaad ah si aad ugu sheegto xanuunka, sida "COVID-19", "novel coronavirus", ama kaliya "fayrus" ama "safmar".

sourceString: Particularly in developing countries where law enforcement are poorly trained, enforcement of curfew, lockdown or stay-at-home orders are often brutal, often using forces not proportionate against crowds.
targetString: Gaar ahaan dalalka soo koraya oo ciidanka aan si wanaagsan loo tobobarin, in bandooda la dhaqan geliyo, xidhitaanka ama amarka joogitaanka guriga badanaa waxyeelo ayay keentaa, xataa in loo isticmaalo awood aan ku haboonayn dadka isku yimid.

sourceString: Comply with these orders, and avoid crowds in public.
targetString: In loo hogaansamo amaradan, iyo in la iska ilaaliyo meelaha dadku iskugu yimaadaan.

sourceString: As a result of the coronavirus pandemic, xenophobia has risen in many countries, primarily but not exclusively targeting people perceived to be Chinese.
targetString: Waxa uu keeney safmarka coronavirus, nacayb ka yimid dalal badan, kaar ahaan si gaar ah loogu bartilmaameedsanayo dadka Jayniiska ah.

sourceString: There has been a worldwide spike in racist incidents targeting people of East Asian origin, including in major cities such as New York, London and San Francisco.
targetString: Caalamka oo dhan waxa ajira kor u kac dhacdooyinka midab takoorka ah ee lagu bartilmaameedsanayo dadka kasoo jeeda Bariga Dhexe, oo ay ku jiraan dakda magaalooyinka waawayn ee sida New York, London iyo San Faransisco.

sourceString: In Hong Kong, Sinophobia, which was already high to begin with, has intensified as a result of the pandemic, with the result that many shops and restaurants are now denying service to mainland Chinese customers and banning Mandarin speakers from their premises (with the exception of Taiwanese).
targetString: Hong Kong, Nacaybta, oo marka hore aad u badnaa, ayaa kor usii kaxay safmarka dartiid, taas oo keeney in tukaamo iyo maqaaxiyo badan ay iminka u diidaan inay u shaqeeyaan dadka Jayna ka yimid oo sidoo kale ay mamnuuceen ku hadalka Madarin inta meeshooda la joogo (marka laga reeco Taywaaniiska).

sourceString: Levels of xenophobia have also risen in East Asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in Japan and China refusing service to foreign customers.
targetString: Heerka nacaybka ayaa sidoo kale kordhay Bariga Aasiya, taas oo maqaaxiyaha qaar iyo ganacsiyada kale ee Jabaan iyo Jayna la diiday inay u shaqeeyaan dadka ajaanibka ah.

sourceString: In China, there have been incidents of foreigners being refused rooms by hotel staff, and foreign residents, particularly black people, being kicked out of their apartments on short notice by their landlords.
targetString: Jayna, waxaa jirtay dhacdo dad ajaanib ah ay shaqaalaha hudheelku u diiday, iyo dadka deegaanka ah oo ajaanib ah, gaar ahaan dadka madaw, in laga saaray guryahoodii iyada oo markaa ay wargelin mudo yar ah ka heley cida guriga leh.

sourceString: Sources for further information on the coronavirus outbreak include:
targetString: Meelaha kale ee laga heley macluumaadka coronavirus waxaa kamid ah:

sourceString: The US government Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
targetString: Xarunta Kahortaga iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunada dawlada Maryakanka

sourceString: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (daily updates)
targetString: Xarunta Kahortaga iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunada Yurub (macluumaad maalin kasta ah)

sourceString: United Kingdom government, - Foreign and Commonwealth Office advice for Travellers
targetString: Dawlada Ingriisika - Xafiiska Arrimaha Dibada iyo Komonwoolka taladadiis Socdaalayaasha

sourceString: An online map and dashboard from the John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering with live updates
targetString: Khariirada onlineka ah iyo madasha laga heley Xarunta Jaamacada John Hopkins ee Sayniska Nidaamyada iyo Injineerinka oo toos looga helo.

sourceString: Partial lists of entry restrictions from IATA and The New York Times
targetString: Qayb kamid ah liiska xadidaada soo gelitaanka waxaa laga heley IATA iyo New York Times

sourceString: A variety of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are being promoted online and even by some government officials, so be careful which sources you check for information.
targetString: Macluumaad badan oo khaldan iyo mala awaal ah ayaa laga baahiyay fayruska online ahaan oo xataa waxaa dhacdo inay baahiyaan mararka qaar masuuliyiinta dawladu, markaa waa in aad ka taxadirtaa meesha aad macluumaadka kala soo baxayso.

sourceString: Ensure that all information and advice you receive has been backed by reputable doctors and scientists.
targetString: Waxaad xaqiijisaa in dhamaan macluumaadka iyo talooyinka aad heleysaa ay jiraan wax lagu xoojiyo oo dhakhaatiirta iyo sayniska laga heley.

sourceString: In a crisis, it's natural to want to keep following the latest updates, but it may be better for your mental health to moderate the amount of news that you look at, and stick to reliable news sources.
targetString: Wakhtiyada mushkilada, waa caadi in aad la socoto macluumaadka ugu danbeeya, laakiin waxaa u wanaagsan caafimaadkaaga maskaxda in aan xadido wararka aad eegeyso, oo aad meel kale wararka ka doonato.

sourceString: If you normally watch the news twice per day then stick to this schedule and do something else, rather than having the 24-hour news on continuously.
targetString: Hadii aad caadiyan daawato wararka laba jeer maalintii, waxa aad markaa ku joogtaa jadwalkaas oo wax kale qabto, halka aad 24 saacadood si joogto ah u daawan lahayd wararka.

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: b'Angiotensin-u badalmay enzyme 2 (ACE2) waxaa weeye enzyme ku lifaaqan dusha (xabka unuga) ee unuga sanbabka, xididada, wadnaha, kalyaha, iyo xiidhmaha

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu kasoo horjeedaa hawsha la xidhiidhi angiotensim- badala enzyme (ACE) isaga oo yaraynaya xadiga angiotensin-II oo kordhinaya Ang (1-7) kaas oo ka dhigaya dawo wanaagsan oo markaa bartilmaameedsata xanuunka wadnaha. ACE2 waxaa sidoo kale weeye meesha laga soo galo unuyada coronaviruska qaar.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Nuqulka bilaa aadanka ee enzyme waxaa badanaa loo yaqaan hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Angiostensin-badalka enzyme 2 waxaa weeye sinki uu ku jiro metalloenzyme oo ku yaal dusha endothelial iyo unugyada kale.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: ACE2 borootiinta ah waxaa ku jira N-terminal ah oo peptidase M2 meelaas ah iyo C-terminal oo aaga qaada aysiidha rental amino ah.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 waxa weeye nooc kaliya oo I xabka borootiinta ah, kaas oo leh aaga enzymatically firfircoon oo markaa gaadha dusha unuga ee sanbabka iyo unugyada kale.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Aagaga unugyada dheeraadka ah ee ACE2 waxa ay ku xardhan yihiin aaga unuga kaas oo qaada enzyme loo yaqaan sheddase, oo keena borootiin milanta oo waxa uu ku baxaa xidida dhiiga oo waxa uu burburiyaan wixii kaadida laga soo saaray.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu ku jiraa badanaa unugyada: ACE2 waxa uu weeraraa xabka unuga caadiyan sanbabka nooca II alveolar unugyada ah, enterocytes ee xiidmaha yar, xididka iyo unugyada endothelial kala duwan iyo unugyada murqaha ee badanaa unugyada.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: ACE2mRNA kalma ah waxaa sidoo kale laga helaa cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, iyo unugyada maskaxda.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Shaqada kowaad ee ACE2 waxaa weeye inay noqoto dheelitirka ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: Hormoonada ACE cleaves angiotensin I ee duubka murqaha ee angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 waxa kasoo qaadaa carboxyl-terminal amno aysiidh phenylalanine angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-lle-His-Pro-Phe) iyo hydrolyses oo uu geliyaa vasodalitor angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-lle-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu sodo kale kasoo qaadaa tiro kale oo peptides ah oo ay ku jiraan [des-arg9] - bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A iyo ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu sidoo kale maamulaa socodka xabka ee neutral amino acid ee laga qaadayo SLC6A19 oo markaa lagu sheegey xanuunka Hartnup.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Borootiinta wadida xabka, ACE2 waxa uu yahay meesha laga galo ee wayn ee unuga ee coronavirus qaar, oo ay ku jiraan HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (fayruska keena SARS); SARS-CoV-2 (fayruska keena COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Gaar ahaan, isku darka kor u kaca botooriinta S1 ee SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV2 ee aaga enzymatic ee ACE2 ee dusha unuga ee ka yimid endocytosis iyo gudbinta ee fayriska iyo enzyme yada ee endosomes ee ku yaala unuyada gudahooda.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Nidaamkan dhan waxa uu u baahan yahay in la hormariyo botooriinta S ee borootiinta serina sida ee TMPRSS2, ee sanka laga qaado taas oo wakhti xaadirkan la baadhayo inay tahay dabiib borootiin. Taasina waxay horseedi kartaa mala awaalka hoos u dhigaya heerarka ACE2, unuga dhexdiisa, taas oo gacan ka gaysan kara la dagaalanka xanuunka.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Laakiin, bulshooyinka xirfadaha badan iyo ururada xeerarka sameeyay waxay ku taliyeen in lasii wado heerka sii socodka qaadashada ACE iyo daawaynta ARB.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Qiimayn isdaba joog ahayd iyo qiimaynta birta oo la baahiyay Juulay 11, 2012, ayaa lagu ogaaday in "isticamalka neefsiga ACE uu la xidhiidhay hoos u dhig wayn oo 34% ah khatarta xanuunka sanbabka marka loo eego xakamaynta."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Sidoo kale, "khatarta sanbab xanuunka ayaa sidoo kale ku yaraan kara bukaanka lagu daweeyo neefsiga ACE kaas oo markaa khatar sare ugu jira sabab xanuun, gaar ahaan dadka uu faaliga iyo wadne xanuunka qaba.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Isticmaalka neefsia ACE kaas oo la xidhiidha sanbab xanuunka dhimashada ka timaada ayuu yareeyaa, in kasta oo najiitada ay aad uga waxtar yarayn marka loo eego khatarta guud ee xanuunada sanbabka."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Isku darka ilaa aadanka ee ACE2 (rhACE2) taas oo guudmar u ah daawaynta novel ee dhaawaca sanbabka ee daran, iyo in hormar lagu sameeyo hemodynamics-ka baabacada iyo ogsajiinta cufan ee doofaarka oo leh calaamado xanuun daran oo neefsiga ah oo leh lipopolysaccharide.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Kala badh nolosha rhACE2 bilaa aadanka waxaa weeye ilaa 10 saacadood oo waxa uu ku salaysan yhaay ficilka 30 daqiiqo oo dheeraad ah oo mudada wax ku oolka ah (mudada) 24 saacadood.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Dhawr daraasadood ayaa sheegaya in rhACE2 uu yahay dawo waxtar u leh dadka aad qaadain karin dawada neefsiga ee renin-angiotesin (dawada neefsiga RAS) ama xanuunka wareega angiotensin II uu kordhay. Ku shubida rhACE2 ayaa lagu qiimeeyay tijaabo xarun caafimaad oo daawaynta xanuunada neefsiga ee daran.

sourceString: b'Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), also sometimes called SARS-like coronavirus WIV1, is a strain of Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) isolated from Chinese rufous horseshoe bats (Rhinolophus sinicus).
targetString: b'Bat SARS-sida coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL_CoV-WIV1), sidoo kale waxaa loo yaqaan SARS-sida coronavirus WIV1, waxaa weeye xanuun neefsiga oo daran ee coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) oo markaa laga soo qaaday fiidmeer la dhaqday oo Jayniis ah (Rhinolophus sinicus).

sourceString: Like all coronaviruses, virions consist of single-stranded positive-sense RNA enclosed within an envelope.
targetString: Sida dhamaan coronavirus oo dhan, virions waxa uu ka kooban yahay hal xadhig oo boosatif ah oo RNA oo lagu xidho bushqad.

sourceString: The discovery confirms that bats are the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Daraasada waxaa lagu ogaaday in fiidmeerta ay u tahay meesha dabiicin uu ku hoobto SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis shows the possibility of direct transmission of SARS from bats to humans without the intermediary Chinese civets, as previously believed.
targetString: Phylogenetic qiimaynta lagu sameeyay waxaa lagu arkay in ay macquul tahay in SARS uu fiidmeerta uga soo gudbay bilaa aadanka iyada oo aanu markaa soo marin quusinta Jayniiska, sidii marka hore la aaminsanaa.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'COVID-19 app-babka ah ee barnaamijyada sooftiweerada mobileka ee loogu talo geley in ay gacan ka gaystaan la socodka ee lagaga jawaabayo safmarka 2019-20 coronavirus, sida, nidaamka lagu ogaanayo qofka ("u dhaanshaha") u dhawaaday qof qaba caabuqa.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Dawlado kala duwan ayaa soo saaray ama ku taliyay, saraakiisha dawlada ayaa taageerada deegaanmada iyo meelaha qaar.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Dhawr nidaam ayaa la sameeyay app-ka lagula soconayo.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Walaacyada sirta ayaa ka yimid, gaar ahaan nidaamyada ku salaysan la socodka goobta uu ku sugan yahay isticmaalaha app-ku.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Qaabka ka yar kaas waxaa kamig ah isticmaalka falaadha Buluutuutka ee lagu duwaan gelinayo inta isticmaalka taleefanka kale sita la isku jirsaday.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Abriil 10, 2020, Google iyo Apple ayaa si wada jir ah ugu dhawaaqay in ay dhax gelin doonaan qaab lagu xoojinayo app-ka Buluutuutka si toos ah Android-kooda iyo iOS obeerin sistemyadooda.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Jayna, dawlada Jayna, oo la socota Alipay, waxa ay sameeyeen app u ogolaanay dadka muwadiniinta inay eegaan hadii uu qofku u dhawaaday cid qabta COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Waxa lagu isticmaalaa wax ka badan 200 oo magaalo Jayna. Singaaboor, app loo uaqaan TraceTogether ayaa la isticmaalaa.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: App-ka waxa sameeyay bulshada IT ee deegaanka, waxaa lasoo daayay isaga oo furan oo waxa lagu wareejinayaa dawlada. Waqooyiga Macedonia waxa ay samaysay "StopKorona!", oo ah app Bulutuut ku shaqeeya oo lagula socdo isasoo gaadhka dadka qaba xanuunka oo markaa bixiya jawaab degdeg ah oo maamulka daryeelka caafimaadka ah.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: App-ka waxaa sameeyay Wasaarada Isgaadhsiinta iyo Teknooloojiyada iyo Wasaarada Caafimaadka.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Abriil 14 2020, app-ka waxa uu sugayaa ansixinta Google Play Store iyo Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Abriil 12, dawlada waxay sheegtey in meel wanaagsan uu marayo app-ka la socodka u dhawaanshaha dadka qaba, oo markaa uu soo bixi doonto todobaad gudihii. Sidoo kale waxaa la qorshaynayaa in Ayrlaan, iyo Faransiiska app-ba lamid ah ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Awstaraaliya iyo New Zealand labaduba waxay ka fikirayaan inay dhaqan geliyaan app-babka Singaaboor ee TraceTogether app-ka ah iyo BlueTrace nidaamka ah. Ruushka waxa ay wadaa app-ka deegaanka qofka ku xidhaya laga helo COVID-19 ee degan Moscow, kaas oo loogu talo geley in lagu xaqiijiyo in aan guriga aanu kasoo bixin.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ross Anderson, boroofeesar injineerinka ambiga ah oo ka socda Jaamacada Cambridge, ayaa soo saaray liis mushkiladaha ka iman kara nidaamka app-kan ku salaysan, oo ay ku jiraan been ka sheeg cida qabta iyo inay wax tarkoodu ay liitaan hadii isticmaalka app-ku ay ku xadidan yihiin tiro yar oo kaliya oo dad ah.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Ka jawaabida walaacyada faafitaanka ayaa been abuur noqonaya ama waxyeelada app-ka "coronavirus", Apple waxa ay samaysay xadidaad taas oo hay'ada noocyadeed ay ku dari karaan coronavirus app-la xidhiidha App Store-ka, kaas oo kaliya ku xadidan "saraakiisha" ama hay'ada waawayn.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Google iyo Amazon ayaa sidoo kale xadidaad lamid ah sameeyay.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Dadka sirta u ololeeya ayaa muujiyay walaac ku saabsan mushkilad ay keeni karta la socodka dadka badan iyada oo la isticmaalayo app-babka coronavirus, gaar ahaan hadii loo sameeyay la socodka dadka dhismaha ah si loola tacaalo safmarka coronavirus oo la qaybiyo marka khatarta laga gudbo.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Amnesty International iyo wax ka badan 100 hay'adood oo kale ayaa soo saaray bayaan ay ugu baaqayaan in la xadido kormeerka noocan oo kale ah.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Hay'adu waxa ay soo saartay sideed shuruudood oo mashaariicda dawlada ah:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: kormeerka waxa uu noqonayaa "sharci, daruuri oo munaasabb ah";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: meesha ka saarida la socodka iyo kormeerka ayaa ahaa weedha iftiimaysa;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: isticmaalka macluumaadka waxaa kaliya lagu xadidadayaa wixii ujeedo COVID-19 ah;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: amaanka macluumaadka iyo sirta waxaa la ilaalin karayay si loo muujiyo in ilaalintu uu ku salaysan yahay cadaymo;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: kormeerka dhijitaalka ah ayaa lagaga hortagi karaa takoorka iyo muquuninta;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: wixii macluumaad ah ee lala wadaago cid kale waa inuu sharcigu dhigayaa;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: waxaa ay tahay inuu jiro wax ka ilaalinaya lagu tacadiyo iyo xuquuqda dadka muwaadiniinta ah ee lagaga jawaabayo tacadiga;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: ka qayb galka wax ku oolka ah ee dhamaan "dadka dantu kaga jirto" waxa ay u baahan doonaan, oo ay jiraan khabiirada caafimaadka shacabka iyo kooxaha la muquuniyay. German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) iyo Wariyayaasha Bilaa Xuduuda ah (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) ayaa soo saaray sidoo kale liis la eegayo.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Qorshaha ay ku taliyeen Google/Apple waxaa loogu talo geley in lagaga jawaabo mushkilada kormeerka joogtada ah iyada oo meesha laga saarayo qaabka lagula soconayo aaladaha obereetin sistemkooda marka aan loo baahnayn.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Dalalka qaar ayaa isticmaala networki deegaanka ah si ay ula socdaan app-babka, kuwaas oo meesha ka saaray baahida loo qabay soo dejisashada app iyo awooda in la socodka.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: Israaiil, nidaamka la socodka shabakada ayaa la ansixiyay.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Xalalka networkiga ee laga heleyo meelaha isku midka ah ayaa leh mushkilad sirta ah oo mustaqbalka ah.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Laakiin, dhamaan nidaamyadu leh serferka dhexe loola baahna in laga helo macluumaadka goobta qofka; nidaamyo la ilaaliyay sirtooda oo badan ayaa la sameeyay oo isticmaala serfer dhexe kalya si ay u xidhiidhaan dhaxdoodu (eeg qaybta hoose).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: Koonfurta Kuuriya, nidaam aan app lahayn ayaa lagula socdaa isku dhawaanshaha.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Halkii laga isticmaali lahaa app u gaar ah, nidaamku waxa uu soo uruuriyaa macluumaadka la socodka ee meelo kala duwan oo ay ku jiraan macluumaadka la socodka aalada mobile-ka iyo macluumaadka wax ku iibsiga kaadhka, oo waxaana loogu daraa wargelintan la sameeyay oo fariimo qoraal ah dadka ay dhici karto inay qabaan caabuqa.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Sidoo kale iyada oo la isticmaalayo macluumaadka digniinta isku dhawaanahsha, dawladu waxay sidoo kale macluumaadka goobta ka dhigta mid cid walba heli karto, mararka qaar la ogol yahay maadaama oo ay adag tahay in la badalo sharciga sirta macluumaadka kadib markii uu safmarka MERS uu dalka ku habsaday.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Macluumaadkan waxaa laga heli karaa meel kasta oo tirada app-ka iyo websaytyada. Dalalka ay ku jiraan Jermanu waxay eegeysaa nidaamyada ilalaisa sirta iyo kuwa cid walbaaba geli karaan.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Abriil 6, 2020, faahfaahinta lama soo saarin.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: La socodka sirta la ilaaliyay waxaa weeye nuxur balaadhan, taas oo lagu samaeyay daraasan balaadhan oo macluumaadka ah oo socotay ilaa 2013. 7 Abriil 2020, koox khabiiro tobanaan ah ayaa ka shaqaynayay xal sirta ilaalin kara, sida isticmaalka Buluutuutka Tamarta Yar (BLE) si loogu helo aaga dadka kale taleefankoodu ku sugan yahay.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Laakiin, PEPP-PT waxay isku duba ridaysaa dadaalka uu ku jiro qaab meel kaliya ah iyo mid baahsan, oo mana aha qaab kaliya. Nidaamka meesha kaliya ah waxaa kamid ah La Socodka Aaga Sirta La Ilaaliyay oo La Daadajiyay (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Lambarka Xidhiidhka Kumeel Gaadhka ah (TCN, fka Lambarka Wakhtiga Xidhiidhka, CEN), Nidaamka Sirta Xasaasiga ah iyo Qaab La Socodka Xidhiidhka Mobile-ka (PACT) iyo kuwa kale.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Nidaamyadan, ogaanshaha macluumaadka shakhsi ahaaneed ma dhaafo aalada, oo dhamaan qaababka waxa ay ka dhacaan aalada.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Kooxda Sirta ee MIT Media Lab waxa ay sameeyeen SafePaths, madal loo isticmaalayo farsamooyinka ilaalinta sirta marka la uruurinayo ee la qaadayo goobta ama dhabada macluumaadku iskugu imanayaan si loola socdo faafitaanka COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: Iyada oo laga duulayo daraasada laga heley waraaqaha cad "Apps Gone Rogue: Ilaalinta Sirta Shakhsi Ahaaneed ee Safmarka" waxa ay soo saartaan Maarso 2020. Dadaal kale oo lamid ah madasha SafeTrace ee uu qoray Enigma MPC, shirkad samaysa teknooloojiyada taas oo markii hore lagu sameeyay MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: SafeTrace waxa uu ka faa'ideeyaa teknooloojiyada haadhweerka taas oo u sahlaysa dadka isticmaalayaasha inay wadaagaan macluumaadka xasaasiga ah ee goobta iyo macluumaadka caafimaadka oo lala wadaago dadka kale ee isticmaalaya iyo saraakiisha, iyada oo aan la dhaawacaynin sirta macluumaadka.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Abriil 5, 2020, Iskaashiga TCN ee caalamka oo ay aas aaseen kooxaha iska kaashta waxa isku qaabka ah iyo nidaamyada sida wayn isku saarmaya, yoolku waa in la yareeyo qurubyada, oo loo sahlo isku xidhanka caalamka ee la socodka iyo app-ka digniinta, qaab muhiim ah oo lagu gaadhayo in si balaadhan loo dhaqan geliyo.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Abriil 9, 2020, dawlada Singaaboor ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay furtay nidaamka BlueTrace iyada oo isticmaalaysa app-ka dawlada ee rasmiga ah.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Abriil 10, 2020, Google iyo Apple, shirkadaha maamulka Android iyo iOS madalaha mobile ee ah, waxay ku dhawaaqeen barnaamij lagula soconayo isku dhawaanshaha, taas oo la sheegey inuu ilaalinayo sirta, oo koobsaday isku darta teknooloojiyada Tamarta yar ee Bulutuutka iyo inkiribshinka ilaalinta sirta.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Waxay sidoo kale baahiyeen waxa ay ka kooban yahay teknooloojiyada asalaka ah ee nidaamku isticmaalayo.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Sida ay sheegeen Apple iyo Google, nidaamka waxaa loogu talo geley in uu noqdo sadex waji:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: qaybta agabka oo dawlada u sahlaysa inay abuurto app-bab la socodka coronavirus oo si rasmi ah u ilaalinaya sirta

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: inay dhax geliyaan shaqada iOS iyo Android Google iyo Apple qorshahood ay doonayaan inay kaga jawaabaan qaadista iyo joogteynta mushkilada kormeerka iyad aoo marka kowaad lagu qaybinayo nidaamka oo cusboonaysiinta obeetin sistemka, oo kadibna looga saarayao marka ay khatarta meesha ka baxdo si lamid ah.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 drug development is the research process to develop a preventative vaccine or therapeutic prescription drug that would alleviate the severity of 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
targetString: Samaybta dawda b'COVID-19 waxa weli socda daraasadeed lagu samayn lagaa talaal ama dawo lagu daweeyo oo meesha ka saaraysa mushkilada xanuunka 2019-20 coronavirus (COVID-19).

sourceString: The International Clinical Trials Registry Platform of the WHO recorded 536 clinical studies to develop post-infection therapies for COVID-19 infections, with numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections under clinical research to be repurposed.
targetString: Tijaabada Caafimaadka ee Caalamiga ah ee Duwaanka Madasha WHO ayaa lagu duwaan geliyay 536 xarumood oo caafimaad si loo sameeyo daawayn xanuunka marka uu dadka ku dhaco ah oo safarka COVID-19 ah, kuwaas oo lagu samaynayo dawooyin badan oo fayruska ah oo lagu dawaynayo caabuqyada kale ee daraasada lagu wado caafimaad ee dib loogu samaynayo.

sourceString: In March, the WHO initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" in 10 countries, enrolling thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: Maarso, WHO waxay bilawday "Tijaabo MIDNIMO" oo 10 dal ah, taas oo ay ka qayb galeen kumanaan qof oo qaba COVID-19 si loo qiieeyo wax ku oolnimda dawada ee afar dawo oo fayrusyo ah oo hore u jiray ka markaa waxtarka bata.

sourceString: A dynamic, systematic review was established in April 2020 to track the progress of registered clinical trials for COVID-19 vaccine and therapeutic drug candidates.Vaccine and drug development is a multistep process, typically requiring more than five years to assure safety and efficacy of the new compound.
targetString: Intii uu socdaa, waxaa la sameeyay qiimaynta nidaamka oo la sameeyay Abriil 2020 si loola socdo hormarka duwaanka tijaabada caafimaadka ee COVID-19 talaal ah iyo dawada lagu daweeyo kuwa kasoo baxa. Talaalka iyo dawooyinka waxaa lagu sameeyay dhawr talaabo nidaam ah, caadiyan u baahan wax ka badan shan sano si loo xaqiijiyo amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada dawada cusub.

sourceString: Drug development is the process of bringing a new infectious disease vaccine or therapeutic drug to the market once a lead compound has been identified through the process of drug discovery.
targetString: Samaynta dawada ee lagu dooanayo in caabuqa xanuunka loogu sameeyo talaal ama dawo lagu daweeyo marka la ogaado curiya ugu wayn oo lagu ogaado nidaamka samaynta dawada.

sourceString: It includes laboratory research on microorganisms and animals, filing for regulatory status, such as via the FDA, for an investigational new drug to initiate clinical trials on humans, and may include the step of obtaining regulatory approval with a new drug application to market the drug.
targetString: Waxa kamid ah daraasada shaybaadhka cayayaanka iyo xayawaanka, buuxinta shuruucda, sida FDA, ee baadhitaanka dawooyinka cusub ee bilawga ku tijaabinta bukaanka bilaa aadanka, waxaana kamid noqon kara in la helo ansixinta wixii lagu maamulayay ee lagu dabaqayay dawada csuub ee suuga dawooyinka.

sourceString: Development of a COVID-19 vaccine or therapeutic antiviral drug begins with matching a chemical concept to the potential prophylactic mechanism of the future vaccine or antiviral activity in vivo.
targetString: Samaynta talaalka COVID-19 ama dawada fayruska waxa uu ku bilaabmay kiimikada is leh ee nuqulka qaabka daawaynta mustaqbalka prophylasticee talaalka iyo hawlaha dawada fayruska ee vivo.

sourceString: New chemical entities (NCEs, also known as new molecular entities or NMEs) are compounds that emerge from the process of drug discovery to specify a vaccine or antiviral candidate.
targetString: Hay'ada cusub oo kiimiko ah (NCE, ayaa sidoo kale loo yaqaan in ay yihiin shirkada cusub ee molokilaarka ama NMEs) kuwaas oo ah curiayayaal ka yimaada nidaama lagu ogaanayo dawada si loo cayimo talaalka ama dawada fayruska inta ku haboon.

sourceString: These have promising activity against a biological target related to COVID-19 disease.
targetString: Kuwani waa wax ku ool dhanka bartilmaameedka bayloojiga la xidhiidha xanuunka COVID-19.

sourceString: At the beginning of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of the NCE in humans.
targetString: Bilawgii samaynta talaalka ama dawada, wax yar ayaa laga yaqaanay amaanka, sunta, pharmacokinetics, iyo qaabka NCE ee bulaa aadanka.

sourceString: It is the function and obligation of drug development to assess all of these parameters prior to human clinical trials to prove safety and efficacy.
targetString: Shaqadeeda iyo waajibaadka samaynta dawada si loo qiimeeyo dhamaan qaababka mudnaanta tijaabada xarumaha caafimaadka bilaa aadanka si loo xaqiijiyo amaanta iyo wax ku oolnimada.

sourceString: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [FIH] or First Human Dose [FHD], previously also known as "first-in-man" [FIM]).
targetString: Waxyaabaha dheeraadka ah ee samaynta dawooyinka waxaa lagu taliyaa xadiga iyo jadwalka isticmaalka kowaad ee tijaabada bilaa aadanka ("markii kowaad ee bilaa aadanka" [FIH] ama Dawadii Ugu Horeysay ee Bilaa Aadanka [FHD], oo hore loogu yaqaabay "raga markii kowaad" [FIM]).

sourceString: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the NCE: its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
targetString: Sidoo kale, dawooyinka la sameeyay waa inay leeyihiin kiimiko cilmi nafsi oo NCE: waxa kiimikadeedu ka kooban yihiin, xasilinta, iyo xalka.

sourceString: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
targetString: Warshadaha waa in looga faa'idaystaa nidaamka ay isticmaalayaan si ay u sameeyaan kiimikada si ay u miisaamaan kiimikada uu soo saarayao miligiraamkii, si loo sameeyo kiiloogiraamka iyo miisaanka sare.

sourceString: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
targetString: Waxay sidoo kale sharaxeen alaabta ku haboon ee lagu mooriyo kaabsoosha, kiniinka, dhibcaha, irbada murqaha, irbada badhida, ama xididka dawada ah.

sourceString: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (CMC).Many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
targetString: Nidaamyadan marka la isku daro, waxaa loo yaqaan tijaabada kahor iyo samaynta tijaabada keemistari ahaan, soo saar, iyo xakamayn (CMC). Dhinacyo badan oo samaynta dawada ah ayaa diirada lagu saaraa ku qanaca shuruudaha sharciga ee maamulka liisamada dawada.

sourceString: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
targetString: Kuwani waxay guud ahaan dhigaan tijaabada loogu talo geley in lagu ogaado sunta waawayn ee curiyaha novel kahor inta aan lagu isticmaalin bilaa aadanka.

sourceString: The Canadian government announced CA$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Dawlada Kanada waxy ku dhawaaqdan CA $275 milyan oo deeq ah oo 96 mashruuc oo daraasadeed ah oo caafimaad oo lagaga jawaabayo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan talaalo kala duwan oo jaamacaha Kanada ah, taas oo qorshaheedu yahay in la sameeyo "kayd talaal" oo talaalka cusub ee la dhaqan geliyay ah hadii safmar kale oo coronavirus ahi uu yimaado.

sourceString: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
targetString: Dhawr barnaamij oo tijaabo oo markaa ku taxaluuqa sadex, dhawr sano wajigo ah oo ansixinta alaabta ah, iyo afar, waji oo marka la ansixiyo kadib ah oo la socodka amaanka talaalka ama dawooyinka daawaynta:

sourceString: Phase I trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
targetString: Tijaabada wajiga I, waxaa lagu sameeyaa dad ikhtiyaarkood u ogolaaday oo caafimaad qaba, si loo ogaado xadiga iyo amaankeeda.

sourceString: Phase II trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the NCE.
targetString: Tijaabada wajiga II waxa loo isticmaalaa sidii loo samayn lahaa qaab diyaar garawga hore ah oo wax ku ool oo si dheeraad ahna loogu baadhi lahaa tirada yar ee dadka ee qaba xanuunka lagu bartilmaameedsado NCE.

sourceString: Phase III trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Tijaabada Wajiga III ee dadka badan, tijaabada muhiimiyada lagu ogaanayo amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada dadka badan ee qaba safmarka COVID-19.

sourceString: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the NCE advances to the new drug application (NDA) stage to begin marketing.
targetString: Hadii amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada la xaqiijiyo, tijaabada dadka ayaa la joojin karaa markna oo NCE waxay galaysaa dhaqan gelinta dawada cusub (NDA) wajiga ah ee bilawga suuqgaynta.

sourceString: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the FDA, also called post-market surveillance studies.
targetString: Tijaabada wajiga IV marka danbe ayaa la ansixiyaa taas oo ay noqon karto shuruudaha ay FDA ku lifaaqsay, oo loo yaqaan daraasada kormeerka suuqaynta kadib.

sourceString: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
targetString: Marka laga tijaabada u baahan in talaalka novel ama dawada fayruska in la geeyo xarunta caafimaadka marka kowaad, warshahuhu waa inay xaqiijiyaan in sunta mudada dheer ah ama joogtada ah in sidoo kale loo bayaamiyaa si wanaagsan, oo ay ku jirto saamaynta nidaamka hore loogula socday (taranka, tarmida, nidaamka difaaca, iyo kuwo kale).

sourceString: In the United States, this process is called a "new drug application" or NDA.
targetString: Maraykanka, nidaamka waxaa loo yaqaan "dabaqaada dawada cusub" ama NDA.

sourceString: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
targetString: Tijaabada caafimaadka waxaa loo dejiyay sida hormarka looga sameeyo oo waxaa lagu samayn karaa wax ka badal "nashqad kale la qaato" hadii macluumaadka laga helyo ee tijaabadu ay sheegaan wixii wanaagsan ama xun ee wax ku oolka daawaynta.

sourceString: The global Solidarity and European Discovery trials of hospitalized people with severe COVID-19 infection apply adaptive design to rapidly alter trial parameters as results from the four experimental therapeutic strategies emerge.
targetString: Tikaabada Midawga caalmaka iyo Yurub ee dadka ku jira isbitaalka ee qaba xanuunka daran ee COVID-19 waxaa ka waajibo nashqada lala qabadsiinayo ee markaa aadka wax looga badalo qaabka tijaabada taas oo ka imanaysa afar khidadood oo tijaabada daawaynta ah.

sourceString: Adaptive designs within ongoing Phase II-III clinical trials on candidate therapeutics may shorten trial durations and use fewer subjects, possibly expediting decisions for early termination or success, and coordinating design changes for a specific trial across its international locations.
targetString: Nashqadaha la qabsiga ee ka socdo Wajiga II-III ee tijaabada caafimaad ee inta u qalanka daawaynta waxaa lasoo gaabin karaan mudada tijaabada oo waxaa la isticmaali karaa dad yar, waxaan macquul ah in lasoo dadajiyo go'aanka in mar hore la joojiyo ama guusha ah, oo nashqada la isku keeney ee isbadalaysa ee tijaabada gaarka ah ee goobta caalamiga ah.

sourceString: Most novel drug candidates (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in Phase II-III clinical trials.
targetString: Badanaa dawooyinka novel (NCEs) waxaa lagu guuldaraysaa marka la samaynayo, taas oo ah maadaama oo aan la aqbalin suntoona ama maadaama oo aan la xaqiijin inay waxtar leeyihiin xanuunka bartilmaameedka u ah, sida ku cad Wajiga II-III ee tijaaabada xarunta caafimaadka.

sourceString: The high failure rates associated with pharmaceutical development are referred to as an "attrition rate", requiring decisions during the early stages of drug development to "kill" projects early to avoid costly failures.
targetString: Xadiga sare ee ku guul daraysiga ah ee samaynta tijaabada dawada waxaa loola jeero " yaraynta xadiga", ee u baahan go'aanka wakhtiyada hore ee samaynta dawada si mar hore loo "joojiyo" mashruuca oo aan loo gelin kharash.

sourceString: One 2010 study assessed both capitalized and out-of-pocket costs for bringing a single new drug to market as about US$1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.
targetString: Hal daraasad oo 2010 lagu qiimanayay awooda iyo kharash lagu samaynayo hal dawo oo kaliya oo lagu suuqgaynayo oo ahaa ilaa US$1.8 bulyan iyo $870 milyan.

sourceString: A median cost estimate of 2015-16 trials for development of 10 anti-cancer drugs was $648 million.
targetString: Kharashka dawada waxaa lagu qiyaasay 2015-16 tijaabada 10 dawo oo kaansarka la dagaalama inay ahay $648 milyan.

sourceString: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful Phase III trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.
targetString: Naqdin lagu sameeyay 2016 106 dawo oo lagu qiimeeyay tijaabada xarunta caafimaadka, wada guud ee lagu bixiyay warshadaynta dawada la ansixiyay ee lagu guulaystay Wajiga III ee tijaabadu waxay ahayn $2.6 bilyan (2013 doolarka), xadiga oo kordha sanadkii xadi ah 8.5%.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.
targetString: Dhawr tijaabo ayaa la wadaa oo dawooyinka dib loo isticmaali karo ah kuwaas oo hore loogu ansixiyay malaariyada, oo ay ku jiraan afar daraasadood oo hydroxychloroquine ama chloroquine phosphate.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with 9 Phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: Dib u isticmaalka dawada fayruska waxa ay ah badanaa daraasada Jayniiska, kaas oo 9 Wajiga III ee tijaabada ah dib loo sameeyay dhawr dal oo markaa warbixintooda la sugayo dhamaadka Abriil.

sourceString: Led by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation with partners investing US$125 million and coordinating with the World Health Organization, the COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator began in March, facilitating drug development researchers to rapidly identify, assess, develop, and scale up potential treatments.
targetString: Waxaa hogaaminaya Bill ana Melinda Gates Foundation oo cid ay gacan saar leeyihiin kuwaas oo maal galinaya US$125 milyan oo lana shaqaynaya Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka, Xawaaraynta Dawawaynta COVID-19 waxa uu bilaabmay Maarso, kuwaas oo fududeeyay daraasadaynta samaynta dawada si dhakhso loogu ogaado, qiimeeo, loo sameeyo, oo loo miisaao daawaynta mustaqbalka.

sourceString: The COVID-19 Clinical Research Coalition formed to coordinate and expedite results from international clinical trials on the most promising post-infection treatments.
targetString: Iskaashiga Daraasada Caafimaadka COVID-19 waxay samaysteen iskaashi iyo balaadhin natiijada ah oo tijaabada xarunta caafimaadka caalamiga ah ee dawooyinka la filanyo inay waxtar yeeshaan daawaynta kadib.

sourceString: In early 2020, numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections were being repurposed or developed in new clinical research efforts to alleviate the illness of COVID-19.
targetString: Horaantii 2020, waxaa jiray curiyayaal fara badan oo dawada fayruska lagu samaynayay oo markaa lagu dawaynayay caabuqyada kale kaas oo dib loo isticmaalayo ama loo samaynayo dadaalka daraasada tijaabada cusub ee markaa lagu dawaynayo COVID-19.

sourceString: For an already-approved drug (such as hydroxychloroquine for malaria), Phase III-IV trials determine in hundreds to thousands of COVID-19-infected people the possible extended use of an already-approved drug for treating COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Wixii dawooyinka hore loo ansixiyay ah (sida hydoxychloroquine ee maleeriyada), Wajiga Tijaabada III-IV waxaa lagu ogaanayaa boqolaal kun oo COVID-19 ah dad qaba oo ay macquul tahay inay isticmaalaan dawooyin hore loo ansixiyay si loogu daweeyo caabuqa COVID-19.

sourceString: As of early April 2020, 103 candidate therapeutics were in preclinical or a stage of Phase I-IV development, with trial results for 29 drug candidates expected during April.
targetString: Horaantii Abriil 2020, 103 daawayn ayaa la mariyay tijaabada kahor ama heerka Wajiga I-IV ee samaynta, taas oo tijaabadeedu keeney in 29 dawooyin ay u qalmaan intii lagu jiray Abriil.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization (WHO) launched the coordinated "Solidarity trial" in 10 countries to rapidly assess in thousands of COVID-19 infected people the potential efficacy of existing antiviral and anti-inflammatory agents not yet evaluated specifically for COVID-19 illness.
targetString: Maarso, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) waxay samaysay "tijaabo midaysan" oo ay iska kaashadeen 10 dal oo markaa lagu samaynayo tijaabada xanuunka COVID-19 ee dadka qaba ee haysta dawada fayruska lagula dagaalamo iyo waxyaabaha ololka la dagaalama oo aan markaa wali loogu qiimaynin si gaar ah xanuunka COVID-19.

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce mortality?
targetString: Miyay wax kamid ah dawooyinka yareeyaan dhimashada?

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce the time a patient is hospitalized?
targetString: Miyay wax kamid ah dawooyinku yareeyaan wakhtiga lagu jirayo isbitaalka?

sourceString: Do the treatments affect the need for people with COVID-19-induced pneumonia to be ventilated or maintained in intensive care?
targetString: Miyay dawooyin wax ka taraan baahida bilaa aadanka ee ah in lagu yareeyo COVID-19-xanuunka sanbabka ee neefsiga ama in la helo daryeel sare?

sourceString: Could such drugs be used to minimize the illness of COVID-19 infection in healthcare staff and people at high risk of developing severe illness?Enrolling people with COVID-19 infection is simplified by using data entries, including informed consent, on a WHO website.
targetString: Miyay dawada noocan ah loo isticmaali karaa si loogu yareeyo xanuunka COVID-19 ee shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka iyo dadka ku jira khatarta badan ee inay yeeshaan ah xanuun adag? Dadka qaba caabuqa COVID-19 kaliya waxaa weeye in loo isticmaalo macluumaad gelinta, oo ay ku jiraan ogolaanshaha aan rasmiha ahayn, websaytka WHO.

sourceString: After the trial staff determines the drugs available at the hospital, the WHO website randomizes the hospitalized subject to one of the trial drugs or to the hospital standard of care for treating COVID-19.
targetString: Kadib tijaabada shaqalaaha marka la go'aamiyo dawada waxaa la keeni doonaa isbitaalada, websaytka WHO ayaa si nasiib ah ulasoo bixi doona mid kamid ah dadka lagu tijaabiyo dawada ama isbitaalka caadiga ah ee bixiya daryeelka daawaynta COVID-19.

sourceString: The trial physician records and submits follow-up information about the subject status and treatment, completing data input via the WHO Solidarity website.
targetString: Dhakhtarka tijaabada wada ayaa duwaan gelin doona oo gudbin doona macluumaadka ku saabsan xaalada iyo daawaynta, waxa uu buuxin doonaa macluumaadka lagu gelinayo websaytka Loo Dhanyahay ee WHO.

sourceString: A global safety monitoring board of WHO physicians examine interim results to assist decisions on safety and effectiveness of the trial drugs, and alter the trial design or recommend an effective therapy.
targetString: Gudida la socodka amaanka ee caalamka ee dhakhaatiirta WHO ayaa baadhay natiijada kumeel gaadhka ah si ay uga caawiso go'aanka amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada dawada tijaabada ah, oo waxa ay wax ka badaleen nashqada ama waxay ku taliyeen daawayn wax ku ool ah.
